original: Ettha hi āvāṭo kāsu nāma.

analyzed: nihīna guṇānam sattānam ettha gāma saddena gāma vāsinaḥ vuttāḥ abheda upacārena ati

analyzed: citta ekagga tam na vindati tena vuttam kammaṭṭhānam na ghaṭayati itiādi attanā jānāti iti

original: sayameva jānāti. Paccatte cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, attā jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññā ca
analyzed: sayam eva jānāti paccatte ca itam karaṇa vacanam attā jānāti iti vuttam hoti aññā ca

original: devatā jānantīti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā ca jānanti.

original: Niṭṭhitā catubbidhavinayakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: niṭṭhitā catubbidha vinaya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Vinayadharassa ca lakkhaṇādikathāvaṇṇanā.

original: Bhikkhupadabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
analyzed: bhikkhu padabhājanīya vaṇṇanā

original: Tasmāti yasmā pana-saddaṃ apanetvā aniyamena puggaladīpakaṃ yo-saddameva āha, tasmā.
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmā pana saddam apanetvā aniyamena puggala dīpakam yosaddam eva āha tasmā

original: Etthāti imasmiṃ yo-sadde. Pana-saddassa nipātamattattā yo-saddasseva atthaṃ pakāsento

analyzed: yaḥ koci iti vuttam hoti iti āha yaḥ koci nāma ati yaḥ vā saḥ vā yaḥ koci iti vuttaḥ vāsa dhura yuttaḥ

analyzed: vāti vipassanā dhura yuttaḥ vā sīlesu uti pakatīsu

original: Bhikkhatīti yācati. Labhanto vā alabhanto vāti yo koci bhikkhati bhikkhaṃ esati gavesati,
analyzed: bhikkhati iti yācati labhantaḥ vā a labhantaḥ vā ati yaḥ koci bhikkhati bhikkham esati gavesati

original: so taṃ labhatu vā mā vā, tathāpi bhikkhatīti bhikkhūti ayamettha adhippāyo. Ariyāya

original: na kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ viya “dehi dehī”ti evaṃ pavattayācanāya. Bhikkhācariyanti
analyzed: na kapaṇaddhika vaṇibbaka yācakānam viya dehi dehi iti evam pavatta yācanāya bhikkhā cariyanti

original: Agghaphassavaṇṇabhedenāti agghādīnaṃ purimapakativijahena. Purimapakativijahanañhettha

original: bhedoti adhippetaṃ. Dhovitvā apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvaṃ malaṃ, tathā apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyasabhāvā
analyzed: bhedo ti adhippetam dhovitvā apanetum a sakkuṇeyya sabhāvam malam tathā apanetum sakkuṇeyya sabhāvā

original: Upanissayasampannanti pubbe aṭṭhaparikkhāradānūpanissayasampannaṃ. Yo hi cīvarādike
analyzed: upanissaya sampannam ti pubbe aṭṭha parikkhāra dāna upanissaya sampannam yaḥ hi cīvara ādike

original: Brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca. Dukkhassa sammā antakiriyāyāti

original: Pañca pañcavaggiyattherāti pañcavaggiyattherā pañca. Tīṇi satanti tīṇi satāni, gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ

original: Veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva bhagavā mahākassapattherassa attānaṃ

analyzed: mahākassapa theram ovadantaḥ tasmā ati ha te kassapa iti ādim āha

original: Yasmā “paṭisevati nāmā”ti padaṃ mātikāya natthi, tasmā “paṭisevati nāmāti kasmā uddhaṭa”nti

original: yo maññati, tassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “paṭiseveyyāti ettha…pe… mātikāpada”nti āha. Itthiyā
analyzed: yaḥ maññati tassa kāraṇam dassento paṭiseveyya ti āha itthiyā

original: nimittenāti idaṃ “maggena gacchatī”tiādi viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi “maggena gacchatī”ti
analyzed: nimittena ati idam maggena gacchati itiādi viya daṭṭhabbam yathā hi maggena gacchati iti

original: vutte “maggaṃ gacchati, magge vā gacchatī”ti ayamattho labbhati, evaṃ “itthiyā nimittena
analyzed: vutte maggam gacchati magge vā gacchati iti ayam atthaḥ labbhati evam itthiyā nimittena

original: pavesetī”ti vutte “itthiyā nimittaṃ paveseti, nimitte vā pavesetī”ti ayamattho labbhati.
analyzed: paveseti iti vutte itthiyāḥ nimittam paveseti nimitte vā paveseti iti ayam atthaḥ labbhati

original: Idañca yebhuyyena purisapayogadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Nimittaṃ aṅgajātanti atthato ekaṃ.
analyzed: idam ca yebhuyyena purisa payoga dassana attham vuttam nimittam aṅga jātan ti atthataḥ ekam

original: Pavesanaṃ nāma na bahi chupanamattanti āha “vātena asamphuṭṭhe allokāse”ti. Abbhantarañhi
analyzed: pavesanam nāma na bahi āha vātena a samphuṭṭhe āha

original: pavesento “pavesetī”ti vuccati, na bahi chupanto. Abbhantaranti ca pakatiyā sabbaso
analyzed: pavesentaḥ paveseti iti vuccati na bahi chupantaḥ abbhantaranti ca pakatiyā sabbaso

original: pihitassa nimittassa vātena asamphuṭṭhokāso vuccatīti.
analyzed: pihitassa nimittassa vātena asamphuṭṭha ukāsaḥ vuccati iti

original: Idāni sabbathā lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ itthinimitte purisanimitte ca labbhamānaṃ pavesakāle
analyzed: idāni sabbathā lesa ukāsa pidahana attham itthi nimitte purisa nimitte ca labbhamānam pavesa kāle

original: aññamaññaṃ phassārahaṃ padesavisesaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “itthinimitte cattāri passānī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: aññam aññam phassa araham padesa visesam vibhajitvā dassentaḥ itthi nimitte cattāri passāni iti ādim āha

original: Vātena hi asamphuṭṭhe allokāse yattha katthaci ekenapi padesena chupitvā pavesento
analyzed: vātena hi a samphuṭṭhe allokāse yattha katthaci ekena api padesena chupitvā pavesentaḥ

original: “pavesetī”ti vuccati. Vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni asamphusanto paveseti, evaṃ
analyzed: paveseti iti vuccati vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni a samphusantaḥ paveseti evam

original: katavivarassa itthinimittassa heṭṭhimatalaṃ vuccati, purisanimitte pana majjhanti
analyzed: kata vivarassa itthi nimittassa heṭṭhima talam vuccati purisa nimitte pana majjhanti

original: aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati. Uparīti aggakoṭito uparibhāgappadeso. Idañca majjhena
analyzed: agga koṭim sandhāya vadati upari iti agga koṭitaḥ upari bhāga ppadesaḥ idam ca majjhena

analyzed: samiñjitvā pavesentassa majjhima pabba samiñjita aṅgulim katthaci pavesentassa aṅguliyā

original: majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaṃ aṅgajātassa uparibhāgavemajjhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā
analyzed: majjhima pabba piṭṭhi sadisam aṅga jātassa upari bhāga vemajjham sandhāya vuttam heṭṭhā

original: pavesentoti itthinimittassa heṭṭhimabhāgena chupantaṃ pavesento. Majjhena pavesentoti

analyzed: pavesetvā nīharantassa viya majjhena iva chupantam pavesento ti agga koṭiyā chupantam

analyzed: pavesentaḥ majjhima pabba piṭṭhiyā samiñjita aṅgulim ti sambandhaḥ atha vā samiñjita aṅgulim

original: majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyāti yojetabbaṃ. Saṅkocetvāti nimittamajjhena bhinditvā.
analyzed: majjhima pabba piṭṭhiyā pavesentaḥ viya ati yojetabbam saṅkocetvā ati nimitta majjhena bhinditvā

original: Uparibhāgenāti saṅkocitassa uparibhāgakoṭiyā. Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu

original: dasadhā ṭhānabhedaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Heṭṭhā pana visuṃ tāni aggahetvā

analyzed: cattāri passāni iti vacana sāmaññataḥ pi visum visum labbhamānāni ekaccam gahetvā cha

analyzed: vadanti nimitte jātam api camma khīla ādi nimittam eva ati āha āpatti pārājikassa ati upahata kāya ppasādanti

analyzed: a vatvā naṭṭha kāya ppasādam ti vacanam upādinna bhāvassa tena iva āha

original: – “matacammaṃ vā sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā”ti. Sati hi upādinnabhāve upahatepi kāyappasāde
analyzed: mata cammam vā sukkha pīḷakam vā ati sati hi upādinna bhāve upahate api kāya ppasāde

original: pavesetī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paveseti iti hi vuttam

original: Etameva hi atthaṃ sandhāyāti “taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno puggalo parājito hoti parājayamāpanno”ti

original: Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ

original: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti,

original: idaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ. “Atthi tisamuṭṭhāna”nti iminā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānañca
analyzed: idam ananuññāta samuṭṭhānam atthi ti samuṭṭhānan ti iminā adinnādāna samuṭṭhānam bhūta ārocana samuṭṭhānañca

original: saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgahitam yat hi sa cittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti idam adinnādāna samuṭṭhānam

original: Yaṃ pana acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. “Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā

analyzed: pana avasesa samuṭṭhāna sīsena dvi samuṭṭhānam eka samuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti tathā hi

original: samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānantipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Ādi-saddasaṅgahitesu pana paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānapadasodhammatheyyasatthadhammadesanācorivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānesu

original: yaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ dutiyapañcamehi
analyzed: yam kāya cittato samuṭṭhāti idam paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhānam yam dutiya pañcamehi

original: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ catutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti idam pada sodhamma samuṭṭhānam yam catuttha chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti idam

original: theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pañcameneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: theyyasattha samuṭṭhānam yam pañcamena iva samuṭṭhāti idam dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānam

original: Yaṃ pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: yam pañcama chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti idam cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānam ti veditabbam

original: Evaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā

analyzed: dassentaḥ tatra api kiñci kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti iti ādim āha tattha kiñci iti sikkhāpada sīsena

analyzed: āpattim vadati tasmai yā kāyena vā vācāya vā pathavī khaṇana ādīsu viya vītikkamam karontassa

analyzed: bhikkhuniyāḥ hatthataḥ cīvara paṭiggahaṇa āpatti viya ayam kiriyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti

original: nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
analyzed: nāma yā siyā karontassa ca siyā a karontassa ca hoti rūpiya paṭiggahaṇa āpatti viya

original: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontassa
analyzed: ayam siyā kiriyataḥ siyā akiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti nāma yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontassa

original: ca akarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
analyzed: ca a karontassa ca hoti kuṭi kārā patti viya ayam siyā kiriyataḥ siyā kiriyā a kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti nāma

original: Idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni saññāvasena dvidhā katvā dassento “tatrāpi atthi saññāvimokkha”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni sabba sikkhāpadāni saññā vasena dvidhā katvā dassento tatra api atthi saññā vimokkha nti ādim āha

original: Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhanti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: saññāya abhāvena vimokkhaḥ assa ati saññā vimokkhanti majjhe pada lopa samāsaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Yato hi vītikkamasaññāabhāvena muccati, idaṃ saññāvimokkhanti vuccati. Cittaṅgaṃ
analyzed: yatas hi vītikkama saññā abhāvena muccati idam saññā vimokkhan ti vuccati citta aṅgam

original: labhatiyevāti kāyacittādisacittakasamuṭṭhāneheva samuṭṭhahanato. “Labhatiyevā”ti
analyzed: labhatiyā iva ati kāya citta ādi sa cittaka samuṭṭhānehi iva samuṭṭhahanataḥ

original: avadhāraṇena no na labhatīti dasseti. Tasmā yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhati, na labhati ca,
analyzed: avadhāraṇena no na labhati iti dasseti tasmai yam cittaṅgam labhati na labhati ca

original: taṃ “itara”nti vuttaṃ itara-saddassa vuttapaṭiyogavisayattā.
analyzed: tat itaran ti vuttam itara saddassa vutta paṭiyoga visaya ttā

original: Puna sabbasikkhāpadāni cittavasena dvidhā dassento “puna atthi sacittaka”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: puna sabba sikkhāpadāni citta vasena dvidhā dassentaḥ puna atthi sa cittaka nti ādim āha

original: Yaṃ saheva cittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sacittakeneva samuṭṭhānena āpajjati, no acittakena.

original: Vināpīti api-saddena sahāpi cittena āpajjatīti dasseti. Yañhi kadāci acittakena,

original: kadāci sacittakena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti, taṃ acittakanti vuccati. Ettha ca saññādukaṃ

original: kiṇitvā tacchetvā tattheva ṭhapito, so araññasāmikena anuññātopi na gahetabbo. Sāmikehi
analyzed: kiṇitvā tat śetvā tattha iva ṭhapito saḥ arañña sāmikena anuññātaḥ api na gahetabbaḥ sāmikehi

original: chaḍḍitoti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇacchinnassāpīti

analyzed: hoti iti iminā sāmikānam nirapekkha tam dīpeti tena vuttam gahetum vaṭṭati iti yadi

original: sāmikānaṃ sāpekkhatā atthi, na vaṭṭati. Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontīti tāni

analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta vikappa dvayassa yathākkamena vuttam natthi avahāro ti ettha avahāro

original: “pariyosāna”nti vuttā. Tathā hi appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā paṭipakkhassa
analyzed: pariyosānam ti vuttā tathā hi appanā kāle bhāvanāya sama ppavattiyā paṭipakkhassa

original: ca suppahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: ca su ppahānataḥ paggaha ādīsu byāpārassa a kātabbataḥ ajjhupekkhanā ava hoti yam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ “samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti ca ādi. Sā
analyzed: vuttam samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā visuddham cittam ajjhupekkhati iti ca ādi sā

original: tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā “pariyosāna”nti vuttā. Evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā

original: Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni. Tattha evaṃ
analyzed: evam cittam ti ādīni tassa iva cittassa thomana vacanāni tattha evam

original: tividhattagatanti evaṃ yathāvuttena vidhinā paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandanaupekkhānubrūhanañāṇasampahaṃsanāvasena
analyzed: evam yathā vuttena vidhinā

original: tividhabhāvaṃ gataṃ. Vitakkasampannanti kilesakkhobhavirahitattā vitakkena sundarabhāvamupagataṃ.
analyzed: tividha bhāvam gatam vitakka sampannam ti kilesa khobha virahita ttā vitakkena sundara bhāvam upagatam

original: Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena
analyzed: cittassa adhiṭṭhāna sampannanti tasmin yeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantara ppavatti saṅkhātena

original: tathā idhāpi cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti cittekaggatāpi yujjati. Tena hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe

original: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, na ettha vikkhipatīti. Samādhisampannanti visuṃ vuttattā pana
analyzed: cittam adhiṭṭhāti na ettha vikkhipati iti samādhi sampannam ti visum vutta ttā pana

analyzed: vutta nayena iva gahetabbaḥ atha vā samādhissa iva jhāna aṅga saṅgahita ttā cittassa adhiṭṭhāna sampannanti

original: Asubhasaññāparicitenāti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatattā jhānaṃ
analyzed: asubha saññā paricitena ati sakalam kāyam asubhan ti pavattāya saññāya sahagata ttā jhānam

original: asubhasaññā, tena paricitena paribhāvitena. Cetasāti cittena. Bahulanti abhiṇhaṃ.
analyzed: asubha saññā tena paricitena paribhāvitena cetasā ati cittena bahulam ti

original: Viharatoti viharantassa, asubhasamāpattibahulassāti attho. Methunadhammasamāpattiyāti
analyzed: viharatoti viharantassa asubha samāpatti bahulassa ati atthaḥ methuna dhamma samāpattiyā ti

analyzed: methuna dhammena samaṅgi bhāvataḥ paṭilīyati iti eka passena nilīyati nilīnam viya hoti

original: Paṭikuṭatīti saṅkucati. Paṭivattatīti nivattati. Na sampasārīyatīti na visarati,
analyzed: paṭikuṭati iti saṅkucati paṭivattati iti nivattati na sampasārīyati iti na visarati

analyzed: saṇṭhita ttā paṭikuṭati iti apasakkati na upasakkati paṭivattati iti nivattati tatas

original: Addhamāsanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Paṭisallīyitunti yathāvuttakālaṃ paṭi

original: buddhā imesu divasesu piṇḍāya na caranti, vihāreyeva nisīdanti, tesaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotīti ādivacanaṃ.
analyzed: buddhāḥ imesu divasesu piṇḍāya na caranti vihāreya iva nisīdanti tesam dinnam mahapphalam hoti iti ādi vacanam

original: Kalyāṇūpanissayavasenāti pabbajjāya upanissayavasena. Pare kirāti kira-saddo arucisūcanattho.
analyzed: kalyāṇa upanissaya vasena āti pabbajjāya upanissaya vasena pare kira āti kira saddaḥ aruci sūcana atthaḥ

analyzed: idam tesam icchāmattam na pana kāraṇanti attho apare pana vadanti etasmin kira

original: aḍḍhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi, atha satthā imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena

original: vītināmessāmi, iti mayhañceva sukhavihāro bhavissati, anāgate ca pacchimā janatā

analyzed: satthā api gaṇam pahāya ekakaḥ vihāsi kimaṅgam pana mayanti diṭṭhānugatim āpajjissati

original: tadassa bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti iminā kāraṇena evamāhā”ti. Neva koci

analyzed: tasmin khaṇe katvā apagacchati

original: bhaya”ntiādi vuttanti vadanti. “Attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti, aññamaññampi jīvitā

original: 164. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā

original: aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: katāti veditabbā. Pākaṭaṃ karontoti vibhūtaṃ karonto, sabbaso vibhāventoti attho.
analyzed: katā ati veditabbā pākaṭam karontaḥ iti vibhūtam karontaḥ sabbasas vibhāventaḥ iti attho

original: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanañāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento
analyzed: pākaṭīkaraṇam vibhāvanam tattha asammuyhana ñāṇena iva nesam pavattanena hoti iti dassento

original: “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse
analyzed: evam viditam karontaḥ iti ādim āha tattha tasmā iti yasmā ñāṇa sampayutta cittena iva assāsa passāse

original: pavatteti, na vippayuttacittena, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi
analyzed: pavatteti na vippayutta cittena tasmai evaṃbhūtaḥ sabba kāya ppaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi

original: passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭeti anekakalāpatāya
analyzed: passasissāmi iti sikkhati iti vuccati buddha ādīhi iti yojanā cuṇṇa vicuṇṇa visaṭa iti aneka kalāpa tāya

original: cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvena visaṭe. Ādi pākaṭo hoti satiyā ñāṇassa ca vasena katapubbābhisaṅkhārassa
analyzed: cuṇṇa vicuṇṇa bhāvena visaṭe ādi pākaṭaḥ hoti satiyā ñāṇassa ca vasena kata pubba abhisaṅkhārassa

original: pavattattā. Tādisena bhavitabbanti catutthapuggalasadisena bhavitabbaṃ, pageva satiṃ
analyzed: pavatta ttā tādisena bhavitabbanti catuttha puggala sadisena bhavitabbam pagā iva satim

original: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsu pi ṭhānesu ñāṇa sampayuttam eva cittam pavattetabbanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Evanti vuttappakārena sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedanavaseneva. Ghaṭatīti ussahati. Vāyamatīti
analyzed: evam ti vutta ppakārena sabba kāya paṭisaṃvedana vasena iva ghaṭati iti ussahati vā āyamati iti

original: vāyāmaṃ karoti, manasikāraṃ pavattetīti attho. Tathābhūtassāti ānāpānassatiṃ bhāventassa.
analyzed: vāyāmam karoti manasikāram pavatteti iti attho tathābhūtassa ati āna apāna ssatim bhāventassa

original: Saṃvaroti sati vīriyampi vā. Tāya satiyāti yā sā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
analyzed: saṃvaroti sati vīriyam pi vā tāya satiyā ati yā sā āna apāne ārabbha pavattā sati tāya

original: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro, tena saddhinti
analyzed: tena manasikārena ati yaḥ saḥ tattha sati pubbaṅgamaḥ bhāvanā manasikāro tena saddhinti

original: adhippāyo. Āsevatīti “tisso sikkhāyo”ti vutte adhikusaladhamme āsevati. Tadāsevanañhettha
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ āsevati iti tissaḥ sikkhāyaḥ ti vutte adhi kusala dhamme āsevati tad āsevanam ha ittha

original: sikkhananti adhippetaṃ. Purimanayeti purimasmiṃ bhāvanānaye, paṭhamavatthudvayeti
analyzed: sikkhananti adhippetam purima naye ti purimasmin bhāvanā naye paṭhama vatthu dvaya iti

original: adhippāyo. Tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato,
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tattha api kāmam ñāṇa uppādanam labbhate iva assāsa passāsānam yāthāvataḥ dīgha rassa bhāva avabodha sabbhāvataḥ

original: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo
analyzed: tathā api tam na dukkaram yathā a pavattānam tesam gahaṇa matta bhāvato ti tattha vattamāna kāla ppayogo

original: kato. Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ, tasmā sātisayenettha
analyzed: kato idam pana dukkaram purisassa gamana sadisam tasmā sa atisayena ittha

original: pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: pubba abhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetum anāgata kāla ppayogaḥ kataḥ ti imam attham dassetuṃ

original: “tattha yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ñāṇuppādanādīsūti ādi-saddena kāyasaṅkhārapassambhanapītipaṭisaṃvedanādiṃ
analyzed: tattha yasmā itiādi vuttam tattha ñāṇa uppādana ādīsu iti ādi saddena kāya saṅkhāra passambhana pīti paṭisaṃvedana ādim

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Keci panettha “saṃvarasamādānānaṃ saṅgaho”ti vadanti.
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti keci pana ittha saṃvara samādānānam saṅgahaḥ iti vadanti

original: Kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsaṃ. So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāranti assāsa passāsam saḥ hi citta samuṭṭhānaḥ api samānaḥ karaja kāya paṭibaddha vutti tāya

original: tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti
analyzed: tena saṅkharīyati iti kāya saṅkhāro ti vuccati yaḥ pana kāya saṅkhāro vacī saṅkhāro ti

original: evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā
analyzed: evam āgataḥ kāya saṅkhāro cetanā lakkhaṇo sati pi dvāra antara uppattiyam yebhuyya vuttiyā

original: tabbahulavuttiyā ca kāyadvārena lakkhito, so idha nādhippeto. Passambhentotiādīsu
analyzed: tad bahula vuttiyā ca kāya dvārena lakkhito saḥ idha na adhippeto passambhento tiādīsu

original: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ. Tasmā passambhanaṃ nāma
analyzed: pacchimam pacchimam padam purimassa purimassa attha vacanam tasmā passambhanam nāma

original: vūpasamanaṃ, tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa
analyzed: vūpasamanam tat ca tathā apayoge asati uppajjanā rahassa oḷārikassa kāya saṅkhārassa

original: payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatrāti “oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento”ti
analyzed: payoga sampattiyāḥ anuppādananti daṭṭhabbam tatra ati oḷārikam kāya saṅkhāram passambhento ti

original: ettha. Apariggahitakāleti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle, tato eva kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāle.
analyzed: ettha a pariggahita kāle ti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddha kāle tatas eva kāya cittānam pi a pariggahita kāle

original: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, “parimukhaṃ
analyzed: nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya ati hi iminā kāya pariggahaḥ parimukham

original: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti iminā cittapariggaho vutto. Tenevāha – “kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā
analyzed: satim upaṭṭhapetvā ti iminā citta pariggaho vuttaḥ tena iva āha kāyaḥ api cittam pi pariggahitā

original: hontī”ti. Kāyoti karajakāyo. Sadarathāti sapariḷāhā. Sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena
analyzed: honti iti sa pariḷāhā sā ca sadaratha tā garu bhāvena

original: viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti. Balavatarāti sabalā thūlā. Santā
analyzed: avinābhāvinī iti āha oḷārikā ati sabalā thūlā

original: hontīti cittaṃ tāva bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā
analyzed: honti iti cittam tāva bahiddhā vikkhepa abhāvena ekaggam hutvā kammaṭṭhānam pariggahetvā

original: pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ, tato eva taṃsamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammā lahumudukammaññabhāvappattā,
analyzed: pavattamānam santam hoti vūpasantam tatas eva tad samuṭṭhānāḥ rūpa dhammāḥ lahu mudu kammañña bhāva ppattā

original: tadanuguṇatāya sesaṃ tisantatirūpanti evaṃ citte kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā
analyzed: tad anuguṇa tāya sesam evam citte kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tad nissitā

original: assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumasukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti.
analyzed: assāsa passāsāḥ santa sabhāvāḥ anukkamena sukhuma sukhumatara sukhumatamāḥ hutvā pavattanti

original: Tena vuttaṃ “yadā panassa kāyopī”tiādi. Passambhemīti paṭhamāvajjanā. Ābhujanaṃ ābhogo,
analyzed: tena vuttam yadā panassa kāyo pi itiādi passambhemi iti paṭhamā āvajjanā ābhujanam ābhogaḥ

original: sammā anu anu āharaṇaṃ samannāhāro, tasmiṃyeva atthe aparāparaṃ pavattaāvajjanā tasseva
analyzed: sammā anu anu āharaṇam samannāhāraḥ tasmin yeva atthe apara aparam pavatta āvajjanā tassa iva

original: atthassa manasikaraṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro, vīmaṃsā paccavekkhaṇā.
analyzed: atthassa manasikaraṇam citte ṭhapanam manasikāraḥ vīmaṃsā paccavekkhaṇā

original: Sāraddheti sadarathe sapariḷāhe. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ, liṅgavipallāsena
analyzed: sāraddhā iti sa darathe sa pariḷāhe balavam oḷārikam liṅga vipallāsena

original: vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāro hi adhippeto. “Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatī”ti kiriyāvisesanaṃ
analyzed: vuttam kāya saṅkhāraḥ hi adhippetaḥ adhimattam hutvā pavattati iti kiriyā visesanam

original: vā etaṃ. Sukhumanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kāyamhīti ettha citte cāti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā etam sukhuman ti ettha api esa iva nayaḥ kāyamhi iti ettha citte ca ati ānetvā sambandhitabbam

original: Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama jhānataḥ vuṭṭhāya kariyamānam dutiya jhānassa nānā vajjanam parikammam paṭhama jhānaṃ

original: viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne
analyzed: viya dūra samussārita paṭipakkhanti katvā tad samuṭṭhānaḥ kāya saṅkhāro paṭhama jhāne

original: ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto. Esa nayo sesupacāradvayepi. Atha
analyzed: ca dutiya jjhāna upacāre ca oḷārikaḥ iti sadisaḥ vuttaḥ esa nayo sesa upacāra dvaye pi atha

original: vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino
analyzed: vā dutiya jhāna ādīnam adhigamāya paṭipajjataḥ dukkha apaṭipada ādi vasena kilamataḥ yoginaḥ

original: kāyakilamathacittupaghātādivasena vitakkādisaṅkhobhena saparipphandatāya ca cittappavattiyā
analyzed: kāya kilamatha citta upaghāta ādi vasena vitakka ādi saṅkhobhena sa paripphanda tāya ca citta ppavattiyā

original: dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā. Atisukhumoti aññattha
analyzed: dutiya jhāna ādi upacāresu kāya saṅkhārassa oḷārika tā veditabbā ati sukhumaḥ ti aññattha

original: labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo. Sukhumabhāvopissa tattha
analyzed: labbhamāno kāya saṅkhāro catuttha jjhāne atikkanta sukhumaḥ sukhuma bhāvaḥ pissa tattha

original: natthi kuto oḷārikatā appavattanato. Tenāha “appavattimeva pāpuṇātī”ti.
analyzed: natthi kutas oḷārika tā appavattanato tena āha appavattim eva pāpuṇāti iti

original: Lābhissa sato anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanavelaṃ ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ
analyzed: lābhissa sato anupubba samāpatti samāpajjana velam eka āsanena iva vā sabbesam jhānānam

original: paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya majjhimabhāṇakā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānūpacārepi
analyzed: paṭilābham sandhāya majjhima bhāṇakāḥ heṭṭhima heṭṭhima jhānataḥ uparu upari jhānu upacāre pi

original: sukhumataraṃ icchanti. Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā santatā
analyzed: sukhumataram icchanti tattha hi sa upacārānam jhānānam upari upari visesavanta tā santa tā

original: ca sambhaveyya, ekāvajjanūpacāraṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena
analyzed: ca ekāvajjana upacāram vā sandhāya evam vuttam evam hi heṭṭhā vutta vādena

original: imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā. Sabbesaṃyevāti ubhayesampi. Yasmā
analyzed: imassa vādassa avirodhaḥ siddhaḥ bhinna visaya ttā sabbesam yeva ati ubhayesam pi yasmā

original: te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva. Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro
analyzed: te sabbe api vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhim icchantiyā iva a pariggahita kāle pavatta kāya saṅkhāro

original: pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatīti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te eva oḷārikā
analyzed: pariggahita kāle paṭippassambhati iti idam sadisa santāna tāya vuttam na hi te eva oḷārikā

original: assāsādayo sukhumā honti. Passambhanākāro pana tesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
analyzed: assa asa ādayo sukhumāḥ honti passambhana ākāraḥ pana tesam heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva

original: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mahābhūta pariggahe sukhumaḥ ti catu dhātu mukhena vipassanā abhinivesam sandhāya vuttam

original: Sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo bhāvanāya uparūpari paṇītabhāvato. Tenevāha “rūpārūpapariggahe
analyzed: sakala rūpa pariggahe bhāvanāya upari upari paṇīta bhāvataḥ tena iva āha rūpa arūpa pariggahe

original: sukhumo”ti. Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyāti kalāpasammasanamāha. Nibbidānupassanāto
analyzed: sukhumaḥ ti lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanāya iti kalāpa sammasanam āha nibbida anupassanāto

original: paṭṭhāya balavavipassanā, tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
analyzed: paṭṭhāya balava vipassanā tatas oram dubbala vipassanā pubbe vutta nayena ati apariggahita kāla iti ādinā

original: samathanaye vuttanayena. “Apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā
analyzed: samatha naye vutta nayena a pariggahe pavattaḥ kāya saṅkhāraḥ mahābhūta pariggahe paṭippassambhati iti ādinā

original: vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vipassanā naye pi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbā iti vuttam hoti

original: Assāti imassa “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti padassa. Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi.
analyzed: assa ati imassa kāya saṅkhāranti padassa anuyoga parihārehi

original: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena. Kathanti yaṃ idaṃ “passambhayaṃ…pe… sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: evam ti idāni vuccamāna ākārena kathanti yam idam sikkhati iti vuttam

original: taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti
analyzed: tam katham kena pakārena kāya saṅkhārassa passambhanam yogino ca sikkhanam hoti iti

original: kathetukāmatāya pucchitvā kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato oḷārikasukhumato vūpasamato anuyogaparihārato
analyzed: kathetu kāma tāya pucchitvā kāya saṅkhāre sarūpataḥ oḷārika sukhumataḥ vūpasamataḥ anuyoga parihārato

original: ca dassetuṃ “katame kāyasaṅkhārā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kāyikāti rūpakāye bhavā.
analyzed: ca dassetum katame kāya saṅkhārā ti ādi āraddham tattha rūpa kāye bhavā

original: Kāyappaṭibaddhāti kāyasannissitā. Kāye sati honti, asati na honti, tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi
analyzed: kāya paṭibaddhā ati kāya sannissitā kāye sati honti asati na honti tatas eva te a kāya samuṭṭhānā api

original: kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā. Passambhentoti oḷārikoḷārikaṃ passambhento.
analyzed: kāyena saṅkharīyanti iti kāya saṅkhārā passambhento ti oḷārika uḷārikam passambhento

original: Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Oḷārikañhi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ avūpasantasabhāvaṃ sannisīdāpento
analyzed: sesa pada dvayam tassa iva vevacanam oḷārikam hi kāya saṅkhāram a vūpasanta sabhāvam sannisīdāpento

original: “passambhento”ti vuccati, anuppādanirodhaṃ pāpento “nirodhento”ti, suṭṭhu santasabhāvaṃ
analyzed: passambhento ti vuccati anuppāda nirodham pāpentaḥ nirodhentaḥ ti suṭṭhu santa sabhāvam

original: nayanto “vūpasamento”ti.
analyzed: nayantaḥ vūpasamenta iti

original: Yathārūpehīti yādisehi. Kāyasaṅkhārehīti oḷārikehi kāyasaṅkhārehi. Ānamanāti abhimukhena
analyzed: yathārūpehi iti yādisehi kāya saṅkhārehi iti oḷārikehi kāya saṅkhārehi abhimukhena

original: kāyassa namanā. Vinamanāti visuṃ visuṃ passato namanā. Sannamanāti sabbato, suṭṭhu
analyzed: kāyassa namanā vinamanā ati visum visum passataḥ namanā sannamanā ati sabbatas suṭṭhu

original: vā namanā. Paṇamanāti pacchato namanā. Iñjanādīni ānamanādīnaṃ vevacanāni, adhimattāni
analyzed: vā namanā paṇamanā ati pacchatas namanā iñjana ādīni ānamana ādīnam vevacanāni adhimattāni

original: vā abhimukhacalanādīni ānamanādayo, mandāni iñjanādayo. Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti
analyzed: vā abhimukha calana ādīni ānamana ādayaḥ mandāni iñjana ādayaḥ

original: tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento. Tasmiñhi
analyzed: tathārūpam ānamana ādīnam kāraṇa bhūtam oḷārikam kāya saṅkhāram tasmin hi

original: passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
analyzed: passambhite ānamana ādayaḥ pi passambhitāḥ eva honti

original: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo
analyzed: santam sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāya saṅkhārehi kāyassa a paripphandana hetūhi ānamana ādayaḥ

original: na honti, tathārūpaṃ darathābhāvato santaṃ, anoḷārikatāya sukhumaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
analyzed: na honti tathārūpam darathā bhāvataḥ santam anoḷārika tāya sukhumam passambhayam

original: kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati. Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāranti sāmaññataḥ ekam katvā vadati atha vā pubbe oḷārika uḷārikam kāya saṅkhāram

original: paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā

original: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.

original: Itītiādi codakavacanaṃ. Tattha itīti pakāratthe nipāto, kirāti arucisūcane, evañceti

original: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne. Vātūpaladdhiyāti vātassa upaladdhiyā.

analyzed: upacchijjati puna bāhullika piṇḍapātikā āgantvā bhante asukaḥ

original: upaṭṭhāko upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti, so
analyzed: upaṭṭhākaḥ upāsakaḥ upāsikā amaccaḥ amacca dhītā tumhākam dassana kāmā ti vadanti so

analyzed: gaṇha āvuso patta cīvaranti gamana sajjaḥ uva hoti nicca byāvaṭaḥ tassa iva te paccayā palibodhā

analyzed: honti tena gaṇam pahāya yattha nam na jānanti tattha ekakena caritabbam evam so

original: palibodho upacchijjati.
analyzed: palibodhaḥ upacchijjati

original: Gaṇoti suttantikagaṇo vā ābhidhammikagaṇo vā. Yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā
analyzed: gaṇaḥ ti suttantika gaṇaḥ vā ābhidhammika gaṇaḥ vā yaḥ tassa uddesam vā paripuccham vā

original: upacchinditabbo – sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu kataṃ hoti, appaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ niṭṭhapetvā
analyzed: upacchinditabbaḥ sace tesam bhikkhūnam bahu katam hoti appam avasiṭṭham tam niṭṭhapetvā

original: araññaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Sace appaṃ kataṃ, bahu avasiṭṭhaṃ, yojanato paraṃ agantvā antoyojanaparicchede
analyzed: araññam pavisitabbam sace appam katam bahu avasiṭṭham yojanataḥ param a gantvā antar yojana paricchede

original: aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti vattabbaṃ. Evampi
analyzed: aññam gaṇa vācakam upasaṅkamitvā ime āyasmai uddesa ādīhi saṅgaṇhatu iti vattabbam evam pi

original: alabhamānena “mayhaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ kiccaṃ atthi, tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni gacchathā”ti
analyzed: a labhamānena mayham āvuso ekam kiccam atthi tumhe yathāphāsuka ṭṭhānāni gacchatha ati

original: gaṇaṃ pahāya attano kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇam pahāya attano kammam kātabbam

original: Kammenāti kammapalibodhena. “Kammañca pañcama”ntipi pāṭho. Tattha kammanti navakammaṃ.
analyzed: kammena ati kamma palibodhena kammam ca pañcamam tipi pāṭhaḥ tattha kammam ti nava kammam

original: niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace bahu, saṅghikaṃ ce, navakammaṃ saṅghassa vā bhārahārakabhikkhūnaṃ

analyzed: vā niyyātetabbam attanaḥ santakam ce attanaḥ bhāra hārakānam niyyātetabbam tādisam

original: alabhantena saṅghassa pariccajitvā gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: a labhantena saṅghassa pariccajitvā gantabbam

original: Addhānanti maggagamanaṃ. Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti, paccayajātaṃ vā

original: kiñci laddhabbaṃ hoti. Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ, araññaṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: kiñci laddhabbam hoti sace tam a labhantaḥ na sakkoti adhivāsetum araññam pavisitvā

original: samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodayaṃ hoti, tasmā gantvā
analyzed: samaṇa dhammam karontassa api gamika cittam nāma duppaṭivinodayam hoti tasmā gantvā

original: taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam kiccam tīretvā ava samaṇa dhamme ussukkam kātabbam

original: Ñātīti vihāre ācariyupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaantevāsikasamānupajjhāyakasamānācariyakā,

analyzed: saddhivihārikaḥ upasampādita pabbājita antevāsika samāna upajjhāyakā ca nissaya ācariya auddesa ācariya nissaya ntevāsika auddesa ntevāsika samāna ācariyakā

original: pana yāva nissayauddesā anupacchinnā, tāva paṭijaggitabbā. Pahontena tato uddhampi
analyzed: pana yāva nissaya oddesā anupacchinnā tāva paṭijaggitabbā pahontena tatas uddham pi

analyzed: natthi attanaḥ santakam dātabbam asati bhikkhā cariyāya pariyesitvā api dātabbam eva

original: Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ. Sace natthi, attano santakaṃ
analyzed: bhātu bhaginīnam pana tesam santakam eva yojetvā dātabbam sace na atthi attanaḥ santakam

analyzed: tāvakālikam da tvā pacchā labhantena gaṇhitabbam a labhantena na codetabbā aññātakassa

analyzed: bhaginiyā sāmikassa bhesajjam na iva kātum na dātum vaṭṭati tuyham sāmikassa dehi iti

analyzed: ñātakāya iva ati tesam kātum vaṭṭati

original: samaṇadhammo kātabbo.
analyzed: samaṇa dhammaḥ kātabbaḥ

analyzed: gantho ti pariyatti pariharaṇam tam sajjhāya ādīhi nicca byāvaṭassa iva palibodhaḥ hoti na itarassa

analyzed: iddhiyā ti iddhi palibodhena iddhi iti te tattha iddhi iti pothujjanikā

analyzed: apalibodhaḥ kātabbaḥ iti attho

analyzed: bhikkhūnam mudu citta tam janeti iti attani mudu citta tam uppādeti ayaṃ ca sahavāsīnam

original: tassa yogānuyogakammassa. Padaṭṭhānattāti nipphattihetuttā.
analyzed: tassa yoga anuyoga kammassa padaṭṭhāna ttā ati nipphatti hetu ttā

original: Odātakasiṇe ālokakasiṇaṃ, kasiṇugghāṭimākāsakasiṇe paricchinnākāsakasiṇañca antogadhaṃ

analyzed: anussatiyaḥ cattāro brahmavihārā cattāro āruppāḥ ekā saññā ekam vavatthānanti

original: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ

analyzed: lohita kasiṇam odāta kasiṇam āloka kasiṇam ime dasa kasiṇāḥ

original: Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ
analyzed: uddhumātakam vinīlakam vipubbakam vicchiddakam vikkhāyitakam vikkhittakam hatavikkhittakam

analyzed: lohitakam puḷavakam aṭṭhikam ti ime dasa asubhā buddha anussati dhamma saṅgha sīla

original: anussatiyo. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
analyzed: anussatiyaḥ mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ime cattāraḥ brahmavihārāḥ ākāsānañcāyatanam

original: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime cattāro āruppā.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatanam ākiñcaññāyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime cattāro āruppā

original: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ekā saññā. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti.
analyzed: āhāre paṭikūla saññā ekā saññā catu dhātu vavatthānam ekam vavatthānanti

original: Yaṃ yassa caritānukūlanti ettha rāgacaritassa tāva dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatīti ekādasa
analyzed: yam yassa ettha rāga caritassa tāva dasa asubhā kāya gatā asatī iti ekādasa

original: kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni, dosacaritassa cattāro brahmavihārā cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇānīti

analyzed: aṭṭha moha caritassa ca vitakka caritassa ca ekam āna apāna ssati kammaṭṭhānam eva saddhā caritassa

original: purimā cha anussatiyo, buddhicaritassa maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
analyzed: purimāḥ cha anussatiyaḥ buddhi caritassa maraṇa ssati upasamā anussati catu dhātu vavatthānam

original: Kasiṇesu ca yaṃ kiñci parittaṃ vitakkacaritassa, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritassa anukūlanti
analyzed: kasiṇesu ca yam kiñci parittam vitakka caritassa appamāṇam moha caritassa anukūlanti

original: Yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo hoti, tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā
analyzed: yam kammaṭṭhānam gahetu kāmo hoti tassa iva vasena catukka pañcaka jjhānāni nibbattetvā

original: jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbanti
analyzed: jhāna padaṭṭhānam vipassanam vaḍḍhetvā āsava khaya pattassa khīṇa āsavassa santike gahetabbanti

original: āha – “imināva kammaṭṭhānena…pe… uggahetabba”nti. Arahantādayo hītiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato
analyzed: āha uggahetabbanti arahanta ādayaḥ hi itiādi ekacca khīṇa āsavato

original: viyāti kammaṭṭhānapathaviṃ mahāhatthipathaṃ katvā dassento viya. Sappāyāsappāyaṃ
analyzed: viyā ati kammaṭṭhāna pathavim mahā hatthi patham katvā dassentaḥ viya sappāya asappāyam

original: ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena

original: ubhayampi gahetvā gaṇetabbaṃ. Yo upaṭṭhātīti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro
analyzed: ubhayam pi gahetvā gaṇetabbam yaḥ upaṭṭhāti iti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭa vātesu yo pākaṭataro

original: upaṭṭhāti, so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti
analyzed: upaṭṭhāti so gahetabbaḥ ti ayam pi atthaḥ dīpitaḥ iti daṭṭhabbam pavattamānam pavattamānam

original: āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Evanti vuttappakārena
analyzed: āmeḍita vacanena nirantaram assāsa passāsānam upalakkhaṇam dasseti evam ti vutta ppakārena

original: upalakkhetvāvāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvāva gaṇentassa
analyzed: upalakkhetvā ava iti attho paṭhamam ekekasmin upaṭṭhite api upalakkhetvā ava gaṇentassa

original: kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha – “assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hontī”ti. Tena “upalakkhetvāva
analyzed: kamena ubho api pākaṭāḥ honti iti āha assāsa passāsā pākaṭāḥ honti iti tena upalakkhetvā ava

original: gaṇetabba”nti imassa “tassevaṃ gaṇayato…pe… pākaṭā hontī”ti idaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇetabbam ti imassa tassa ivam gaṇayatā upe pākaṭāḥ honti iti idam kāraṇa vacanam daṭṭhabbam

original: Tattha pākaṭā hontīti gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato vibhūtā honti.
analyzed: tattha pākaṭāḥ honti iti gaṇanā vasena bahiddhā vikkhepa abhāvataḥ vibhūtāḥ honti

original: Palighāya parivattanakaṃ yattha nikkhipanti, so palighatthambho. Tiyāmarattinti accantasaṃyoge
analyzed: palighāya parivattanakam yattha nikkhipanti saḥ palighatthambhaḥ ac c anta saṃyoge

original: upayogavacanaṃ. Purimanayenāti sīghagaṇanāya, gopālakagaṇanāyāti attho. Eko dve tīṇi
analyzed: upayoga vacanam purima nayena ati sīgha gaṇanāya gopālaka gaṇanāya ati atthaḥ ekaḥ dve tīṇi

original: cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ
analyzed: cattāri pañca ati gaṇanā vidhi dassanam tasmai aṭṭha ati ādīsu pi ekatas paṭṭhāya iva paccekam

original: aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni. “Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbamevā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ nidassanañca
analyzed: aṭṭha ādīni pāpetabbāni sīgham sīgham gaṇetabbam eva ati vatvā tattha kāraṇam nidassanam ca

original: dasseti “gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hī”tiādinā. Tattha arīyati tena nāvāti arittaṃ, pājanadaṇḍo.
analyzed: dassa iti gaṇanā paṭibaddhe hi itiādinā tattha arīyati tena na avāti arittam pājana daṇḍaḥ

original: Arittena upatthambhanaṃ arittupatthambhanaṃ, tassa vasena.
analyzed: arittena upatthambhanam aritta upatthambhanam tassa vasena

original: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantarappavattaṃ viyā”ti.
analyzed: nippariyāyataḥ nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyam eva ati āha nirantara ppavattam viyā

original: Anto pavisantaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma. Bahi cittanīharaṇepi eseva
analyzed: antar pavisantam manasikarontaḥ antar cittam paveseti nāma bahi citta nīharaṇe pi esā iva

original: nayo. Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragatavātaṃ bahulaṃ manasikarontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nayaḥ abbhantara gata vātam bahulam manasikarontassa vātena tam ṭhānam

original: abbhāhataṃ viya medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti, tathā upaṭṭhāti. Nīharatoti phuṭṭhokāsaṃ
analyzed: abbhāhatam viya medena pūritam viya ca hoti tathā upaṭṭhāti nīharatoti phuṭṭha ukāsam

original: muñcitvā nīharato. Tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamanvesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu
analyzed: muñcitvā nīharato tathā pana nīharato vātassa gati samanvesana mukhena nānā ārammaṇesu

original: cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha “puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī”ti.
analyzed: cittam vidhāvati iti āha puthutta ārammaṇe cittam vikkhipati iti

original: Etanti etaṃ assāsapassāsajātaṃ. Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
analyzed: etat ti etam assāsa passāsa jātam anugamanam ti pavatta pavattānam assāsa passāsānam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ. Tenevāha – “tañca kho ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā”ti.
analyzed: satiyāḥ anu anu pavattanam anugacchanam tena iva āha tat ca kho ādi majjha pariyosāna anugamana vasena ati

original: Nābhi ādi tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Paṭhamuppattivasena hi idha ādicintā, na uppattimattavasena.
analyzed: ādi tattha paṭhamam uppajjanataḥ paṭhama uppatti vasena hi idha ādi cintā na uppattimatta vasena

original: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva. Yattha yattha
analyzed: tathā hi te nābhitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva yattha yattha

original: ca uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti dhammānaṃ gamanābhāvato. Yathāpaccayaṃ pana
analyzed: ca uppajjanti tattha tattha iva bhijjanti dhammānam gamana abhāvataḥ yathāpaccayam pana

original: desantarappattiyaṃ gatisamaññā. Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo
analyzed: desantara ppattiyam gati samaññā hadayam majjhanti hadaya samīpam tassa upari bhāgaḥ

original: majjhaṃ. Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
analyzed: majjham nāsikaggam pariyosānanti nāsika ṭṭhānam tassa pariyosānam assāsa passāsānam

original: samaññāya tadavadhibhāvato. Tathā hete cittasamuṭṭhānā vuttā, na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: samaññāya tad avadhi bhāvato tathā ha ete citta samuṭṭhānāḥ vuttāḥ na ca bahiddhā citta samuṭṭhānānam

original: sambhavo atthi. Tenāha “abbhantarapavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādī”ti. Pavisananikkhamanapariyāyo
analyzed: sambhavaḥ atthi tena āha abbhantara pavisana vātassa nāsikaggam ādi iti pavisana nikkhamana pariyāyaḥ

original: pana taṃsadisavaseneva vuttoti veditabbo. Vikkhepagatanti vikkhepaṃ upagataṃ, vikkhittaṃ
analyzed: pana tad sadisa vasena iva vuttaḥ iti veditabbaḥ vikkhepa gatanti vikkhepam upagatam vikkhittam

original: asamāhitanti attho. Sāraddhāyāti sadarathabhāvāya. Iñjanāyāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa
analyzed: asamāhitanti attho sāraddhāya ati sadaratha bhāvāya iñjanāya ati kammaṭṭhāna manasikārassa

original: calanāya. Vikkhepagatena cittenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe vā.
analyzed: calanāya vikkhepa gatena cittena ati hetumhi karaṇa vacanam ittham bhūta lakkhaṇe vā

original: Sāraddhāti sadarathā. Iñjitāti iñjanakā calanakā, tathā phanditā.
analyzed: sāraddhā ati sadarathā iñjitā ati iñjanakā calanakā tathā phanditā

original: Ādimajjhapariyosānavasenātiādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena na manasi kātabbanti
analyzed: ādi majjha pariyosāna vasena ati ādi majjha pariyosāna anugamana vasena na manasi kātabbanti

original: sambandho. “Anubandhanāya manasikarontena phusanāvasena ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba”nti
analyzed: sambandhaḥ anubandhanāya manasikarontena phusanā vasena ṭhapanā vasena ca manasi kātabbanti

original: yena adhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivarituṃ “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viyā”tiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: yena adhippāyena vuttam tam vivaritum gaṇanā anubandhanā vasena viya iti ādim āha tattha

original: visuṃ manasikāro natthīti gaṇanāya anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena
analyzed: visum manasikāraḥ natthi iti gaṇanāya anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamam kevalam phusanā vasena

original: ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi. Nanu phusanāya vinā ṭhapanāya viya
analyzed: ṭhapanā vasena ca kammaṭṭhāna manasikāro natthi nanu phusanāya vinā ṭhapanāya viya

original: phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyevāti? Yadipi natthi, gaṇanā pana yathā
analyzed: phusanāya vinā manasikāraḥ yadi pi natthi gaṇanā pana yathā

original: kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā, evaṃ anubandhanā ṭhapanāya
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna manasikārassa mūla bhāvataḥ padhāna bhāvena gahetabbā evam anubandhanā ṭhapanāya

original: tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato. Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā
analyzed: tāya vinā tasmā satipi phusanāya na ānantarika bhāve gaṇanā anubandhanā

original: eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha – “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena
analyzed: eva mūla bhāvataḥ padhāna bhāvena gahetvā itarāsam tad abhāvam dassentaḥ āha

original: viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti. Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese
analyzed: viya hi phusanā ṭhapanā vasena visum manasikāraḥ natthi iti yadi evam tā kasmai uddese

original: visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi. Tattha phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: visum gahitā iti āha phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhānā iya iva atiādi tattha phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhānā iya iva

original: gaṇentoti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. Tenāha – “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya
analyzed: gaṇento ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā dasseti tena āha gaṇanāya ca phusanāya

original: ca manasi karotī”ti. Tatthevāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva. Teti assāsapassāse. Satiyā
analyzed: ca manasi karoti iti tattha iva ati phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭhāne iva te iti assāsa passāse satiyā

original: anubandhantoti gaṇanāvidhiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto, phuṭṭhokāseyeva te nirantaraṃ
analyzed: anubandhantaḥ iti gaṇanā vidhim anugantvā satiyā nibandhantaḥ te nirantaram

original: upadhārentoti attho. Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā appanā hoti, evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite
analyzed: upadhārento ti attho appanā vasena cittam ṭhapento ti yathā appanā hoti evam yathā upaṭṭhite

original: nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto. Anubandhanāya cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya
analyzed: nimitte cittam ṭhapentaḥ samādahantaḥ anubandhanāya ca ati ādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya

original: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā. Svāyamatthoti yvāyaṃ “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karoti iti vuccati iti yojanā yvā ayam phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhāneya iva

original: gaṇento tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto”ti vutto, so ayamattho.
analyzed: gaṇento tattha iva gaṇanam paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto ti vuttaḥ saḥ ayam attho

original: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchinati, sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā goṇo viya gavayoti.
analyzed: yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchinati sā mānassa samīpā iti upamā yathā goṇaḥ viya gavayā iti

original: Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolāti peṅkholo. Kīḷatanti kīḷantānaṃ. Mātāputtānanti attano
analyzed: paṅguḷaḥ ti pīṭhasappī dolā ati peṅkholo kīḷatanti kīḷantānam mātā puttānam ti attano

original: bhariyāya puttassa ca. Ubho koṭiyoti āgacchantassa purimakoṭiṃ, gacchantassa pacchimakoṭinti
analyzed: bhariyāya puttassa ca ubho koṭiyo ti āgacchantassa purima koṭim gacchantassa pacchima koṭim ti

original: dvepi koṭiyo. Majjhañcāti dolāphalakasseva majjhaṃ. Upanibandhanatthambho viyāti
analyzed: dve api koṭiyaḥ majjhan ca ati dolā phalakassa iva majjham upanibandhana thambhaḥ viyāti

original: upanibandhanatthambho, nāsikaggaṃ mukhanimittaṃ vā, tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā. Kathaṃ
analyzed: upanibandhana tthambhaḥ nāsikaggam mukha nimittam vā tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā katham

original: ṭhatvā? Satiyā vasena. Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito
analyzed: ṭhatvā satiyā vasena satim hi tattha su upaṭṭhitam karontaḥ yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito

original: nāma hoti avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato. Nimitteti nāsikaggādinimitte.
analyzed: nāma hoti avayava dhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbataḥ nimitta iti nāsikagga ādi nimitte

original: Satiyā nisinnoti sativasena nisīdanto. “Satiñhi tatthā”tiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: satiyā nisinnaḥ ti sati vasena nisīdantaḥ satim hi tattha atiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbam

original: Tatthāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne. Teti nagarassa anto bahi ca gatā manussā tesaṃ saṅgahā ca
analyzed: tattha ati phuṭṭha ṭṭhāne te ti nagarassa antar bahi ca gatā manussā tesam saṅgahā ca

original: hatthagatā. Ādito pabhutīti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya.
analyzed: hattha gatāḥ āditaḥ upameyya ttha dassanato paṭṭhāya

original: Gāthāyaṃ nimittanti upanibandhananimittaṃ. Anārammaṇamekacittassāti ekassa cittassa
analyzed: gāthā ayam nimittam ti upanibandhana nimittam anārammaṇam eka cittassa ati ekassa cittassa

original: na ārammaṇaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti attho. Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso
analyzed: na ārammaṇam ārammaṇam na honti iti atthaḥ a jānataḥ ca tayo dhamme iti nimittam assāsaḥ

original: passāsoti ime nimittādayo tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. Ca-saddo
analyzed: ime nimitta ādayo tayo dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena avindantassa ca saddo

original: byatireke. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. Nupalabbhatīti na upalabbhati na
analyzed: byatireke bhāvanā ati āna apāna ssati samādhi bhāvanā nupalabbhati iti na upalabbhati na

original: sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho. Dutiyā pana parihāragāthā suviññeyyāva.
analyzed: sijjhati iti ayam codanā gāthāya attho dutiyā pana parihāra gāthā su viññeyyā ava

original: Kathanti tāsaṃ codanāparihāragāthānaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Ime
analyzed: kathanti tāsam codanā parihāra gāthānam attham vivaritum kathetu kamyatā pucchāḥ ime

original: tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso – ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā
analyzed: tayaḥ dhammā ti ādīsu pada yojanāya saddhim ayam attha niddesaḥ ime nimitta ādayaḥ tayaḥ dhammā

original: ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti, asatipi ārammaṇabhāve na cime na ca ime tayo
analyzed: ekacittassa katham ārammaṇam na honti asati pi ārammaṇa bhāve na cime na ca ime tayo

original: dhammā aviditā honti, kathañca na honti aviditā, tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ
analyzed: dhammā aviditāḥ honti kathaṃca na honti aviditā tesam hi cittam ca kathaṃ

original: vikkhepaṃ na gacchati, padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati,
analyzed: vikkhepam na gacchati padhānam ca bhāvanāya nipphādakam vīriyam ca katham paññāyati

original: nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca
analyzed: nīvaraṇānam vikkhambhakam sammad eva samādhāna āvaham bhāvanā anuyoga saṅkhātam payogam ca

original: yogī kathaṃ sādheti, uparūpari lokiyalokuttarañca visesaṃ kathamadhigacchatīti.
analyzed: yogī katham sādhā iti upari upari lokiya lokuttaram ca visesam katham adhigacchati iti

original: Idāni tamatthaṃ kakacopamāya sādhetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya
analyzed: idāni tam attham ka kaca upamāya sādhetum seyyathā api itiādi vuttam bhūmi bhāgassa visama tāya

original: cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā, tathā ca sati kakacadantagati duviññeyyāti
analyzed: cañcale rukkhe chedana kiriyā na sukarā siyā tathā ca sati kakaca danta gati du viññeyyā ati

original: āha – “same bhūmibhāge”ti. Kakacenāti khuddakena kharapattena. Tenāha “puriso”ti.
analyzed: āha same bhūmi bhāge iti kakacena ati khuddakena khara pattena tena āha purisaḥ iti

original: Phuṭṭhakakacadantānanti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena. Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: phuṭṭhaka kaca dantānam ti phuṭṭha phuṭṭha kakaca dantānam vasena tena ka kaca dantehi phuṭṭha phuṭṭha ṭṭhānā iya iva

original: purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Tenāha – “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī”ti.
analyzed: purisassa satiyāḥ upaṭṭhānam dasseti tena āha na āgate vā gate vā kakaca dante manasi karoti iti

original: Kakacassa ākaḍḍhanakāle purisābhimukhaṃ pavattā āgatā, pellanakāle tato vigatā gatāti
analyzed: kakacassa ākaḍḍhana kāle purisa abhimukham pavattā āgatā pellana kāle tatas vigatā gatā ati

original: vuttā, na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā
analyzed: vuttāḥ na ca āgatāḥ vā gatāḥ vā kakaca dantāḥ a viditāḥ honti sabbattha satiyāḥ upaṭṭhita ttā

original: chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ āgacchantānañca kakacadantānaṃ abhāvato.
analyzed: chinditabba ṭṭhānam a phusitvā gacchantānam āgacchantānam ca abhāvato

original: Padhānanti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ. Payoganti tasseva chedanakiriyaṃ. Upamāyaṃ “visesamadhigacchatī”ti
analyzed: padhānam ti rukkhassa chedana vīriyam tassa iva chedana kiriyam upamāyam visesam adhigacchati iti

original: padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, yojetvā pana dassetabbaṃ. Teneva visuddhimagge upamāyampi “visesamadhigacchatī”ti

analyzed: na hi asabhāvassa kutoci samuṭṭhānam atthi tena āha nānatas upaṭṭhāti iti upaṭṭhāna ākāra mattam ti vuttam hoti

original: Ime tayo dhammāti assāso passāso nimittanti ime tayo dhammā. Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: ime tayo dhammā ati assāso passāsaḥ nimittanti ime tayo dhammā natthi iti kammaṭṭhāna vasena

analyzed: manasikātabba bhāvena natthi na upalabbhati na upacāranti upacāram pi na pāpuṇāti

original: pageva appananti adhippāyo. Yassa panāti vijjamānapakkho vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbo.

analyzed: vikkhambhitāna eva honti itiādi tattha sannisinna ava ati sammad eva nisīdiṃsu eva upasantāya iva ati

original: Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannaṃ asappāyaṃ. Tañhissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyaṃ, tampimattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhassanti dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathā pariyāpannam a sappāyam tat hissa nimitta antaradhānāya saṃvattati dasa kathā vatthu nissitam sappāyam tampimattāya bhāsitabbam

analyzed: puggalaḥ api a tiracchāna kathikaḥ sīla ādi guṇa sampannaḥ yam nissāya asamāhitam vā cittam

analyzed: bhojanam pana kassaci madhuram kassaci ambilam sappāyam hoti kassaci

original: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ, itaro ca utu asappāyo.
analyzed: itaram bhojanam itaraḥ ca utu asappāyaḥ

analyzed: ñāṇam pi a parisuddham hoti a parisuddhāni dīpaka pallika vaṭṭi telāni nissāya uppanna dīpa sikhāya

original: obhāso viya. Aparisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti,

original: ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi vibhūtāhonti, kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi

analyzed: saddhi indriyam balavam hoti itarāni mandāni tatas vīriya indriyam paggaha kiccam sati indriyam

analyzed: na itarāni itara kicca bhedam tasmā tam passaddha ādi bhāvanāya tatra api

analyzed: uddhacce patitum na labhati tasmā tat ubhayam samam kātabbam ubhaya samatāya hi appanā

original: Tattha adhimuccatoti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Vīriyaṃ paggaṇhatotiādīsupi
analyzed: tattha adhimuccataḥ ti saddahantassa samatha vipassanā vasena ati adhippāyaḥ vīriyam paggaṇhataḥ ti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Abhiññeyyanti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ. Abhijānatoti vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ abhiññeyyanti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbam abhijānato ti vipassanā paññā pubbaṅgamāya

original: maggapaññāya jānato. Pariññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ tīraṇapariññāya maggapaññāya ca parijānato.
analyzed: magga paññāya jānataḥ pariññeyyanti dukkha saccam tīraṇa pariññāya magga paññāya ca parijānataḥ

original: Pahātabbanti samudayasaccaṃ pahānapariññāya maggapaññāya ca pajahato. Bhāvayato sacchikaroto
analyzed: pahātabbanti samudaya saccam pahāna pariññāya magga paññāya ca pajahato bhāvayato sacchikaroto

original: bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ. Keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena
analyzed: bhāvetabbam magga saccam sacchikātabbam nirodha saccam keci pana ittha pītiyāḥ eva vasena

original: abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.
analyzed: abhiññeyya ādīni uddharanti tam ayuttam jhāna ādi samudāyam uddharitvā tatas pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippeta ttā

original: Ettha ca “dīghaṃassāsavasenā”tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca paṭhama catukka vasena ārammaṇataḥ pīti paṭisaṃvedanam

original: vuttaṃ, tathā “āvajjato”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. “Abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānato”tiādīhi pana
analyzed: vuttam tathā āvajjato tiādīhi pañcahi padehi abhiññeyyam abhijānato tiādīhi pana

original: asammohato, “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādīhi ubhayathāpi saṅkhepato samathavasena ārammaṇato
analyzed: asammohataḥ saddhāya adhimuccato ti ādīhi ubhayathā api saṅkhepataḥ samatha vasena ārammaṇato

original: vipassanāvasena asammohato pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā panettha
analyzed: vipassanā vasena asammohato pīti paṭisaṃvedanam vuttanti daṭṭhabbam kasmā pana ittha

original: vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā, na sarūpato evāti? Bhūmivibhāgādivasena
analyzed: vedanā anupassanā ayam pīti sīsena vedanā gahitā na sarūpatas evā ati bhūmi vibhāga ādi vasena

original: vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ. Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento
analyzed: vedanam bhinditvā catudhā vedanā anupassanam dassetum api ca vedanā kammaṭṭhānam dassento

original: bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
analyzed: bhagavā pītiyāḥ oḷārika ttā tad sampayutta sukham sukha ggahaṇa attham pīti sīsena dasseti

original: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānīti sukhappaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedīti padāni
analyzed: etena iva nayena avasesa padāni iti sukha ppaṭisaṃvedī citta saṅkhāra ppaṭisaṃvedī iti padāni

original: pītippaṭisaṃvedī-pade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni. Sakkā hi “dvīhākārehi sukhappaṭisaṃviditā
analyzed: pīti ppaṭisaṃvedī pade āgata nayena iva atthataḥ veditabbāni sakkā hi dvīhā ākārehi sukha ppaṭisaṃviditā

original: hoti, cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni
analyzed: hoti citta saṅkhāra paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato tiādinā pīti ṭṭhāne sukha ādi padāni

original: pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā
analyzed: pakkhipitvā sukha sahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjati itiādinā

original: atthaṃ viññātuṃ. Tenāha “tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ vasenā”tiādi. Vedanādayoti ādi-saddena saññā
analyzed: attham viññātum tena āha tiṇṇam jhānānam vasena atiādi vedanā ādayaḥ ti ādi saddena saññā

original: gahitā. Tenāha “dve khandhā”ti. Vipassanābhūmidassanatthanti pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārasammasanavasena
analyzed: gahitā tena āha dve khandhā ti vipassanā bhūmi dassana atthanti pakiṇṇaka saṅkhāra sammasana vasena

original: vipassanāya bhūmidassanatthaṃ “sukhanti dve sukhānī”tiādi vuttaṃ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato.
analyzed: vipassanāya bhūmi dassana attham sukhanti dve sukhāni itiādi vuttam samathe kāyika sukha abhāvato

original: Soti so passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. “Imassa hi bhikkhuno apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
analyzed: so ti so passambhana pariyāyena vuttaḥ nirodhaḥ imassa hi bhikkhuno a pariggahita kāle tiādinā

original: vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha kāyasaṅkhāravasena
analyzed: vitthārataḥ kāya saṅkhāre vuttaḥ tasmā tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ tattha kāya saṅkhāra vasena

original: āgato, idha cittasaṅkhāravasenāti ayameva viseso.
analyzed: āgataḥ idha citta saṅkhāra vasena ati ayam eva visesaḥ

original: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: evam citta saṅkhārassa passambhanam atidesena dassetvā yat aññam imasmim catukke vattabbam

original: taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pītipadeti “pītippaṭisaṃvedī”tiādinā desitakoṭṭhāse.
analyzed: tam dassetum apica atiādi vuttam tattha pīti pade iti pīti paṭisaṃvedī iti ādinā desita koṭṭhāse

original: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā, na pītīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: pīti sīsena vedanā vuttā ati pīti apadesena tad sampayuttā vedanā vuttā na pīti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedī
analyzed: tattha kāraṇam heṭṭhā vuttam eva dvīsu citta saṅkhāra padesu iti citta saṅkhāra ppaṭisaṃvedī

original: passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu. “Viññāṇapaccayā
analyzed: citta saṅkhāran ti citta saṅkhāra paṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu viññāṇa paccayā

original: nāmarūpa”nti vacanato cittena paṭibaddhāti cittapaṭibaddhā. Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena
analyzed: nāma rūpanti vacanataḥ cittena paṭibaddhā ati citta paṭibaddhā tatas eva kāmam cittena

original: saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā, saññāvedanādayo, idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, saññāvedanāva
analyzed: saṅkharīyanti iti citta saṅkhārā saññā vedanā ādayaḥ idha pana upalakkhaṇa mattam

original: adhippetāti āha “saññāsampayuttā vedanā”ti.
analyzed: adhippetā ti āha saññā sampayuttā vedanā ti

original: Cittappaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato asammohato
analyzed: citta paṭisaṃvedī iti ettha dvīhā ākārehi citta paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇataḥ a sammohato

original: ca. Kathaṃ ārammaṇato? Cattāri jhānāni samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā
analyzed: ca katham ārammaṇato cattāri jhānāni samāpajjati tassa samāpatti kkhaṇe jhāna paṭilābhena ati ādinā

original: vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha – “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃviditā
analyzed: vutta naya anusārena sabbam su viññeyyanti āha catunnam jhānānam vasena citta paṭisaṃviditā

original: veditabbā”ti. Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
analyzed: veditabbā ati cittam modento ti jhāna sampayuttam cittam sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno

original: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyāmodayamāno.
analyzed: tam vā pītim ārammaṇam katvā pavattam vipassanā cittam tāya eva ārammaṇa bhūtāya pītiyā āmodayamānaḥ

original: Pamodentotiādīni padāni tasseva vevacanāni pītipariyāyabhāvato.
analyzed: pamodento ti ādīni padāni tassa iva vevacanāni pīti pariyāya bhāvato

original: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya
analyzed: sampayuttāya pītiyā cittam āmodeti iti jhāna citta sampayuttāya pīti sambojjhaṅga bhūtāya

original: odagyalakkhaṇāya jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena
analyzed: odagya lakkhaṇāya jhāna pītiyā tam eva jhāna cittam sahajāta ādi paccaya vasena ca iva jhāna paccaya vasena

original: ca paribrūhento haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento āmodeti pamodeti ca. Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti
analyzed: ca paribrūhentaḥ haṭṭha ppahaṭṭha ākāram pāpentaḥ āmodeti pamodeti ca ārammaṇam katvā ati

original: uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
analyzed: uḷāram jhāna sampayuttam pītim ārammaṇam katvā pavattamānam vipassanā cittam tāya eva

original: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
analyzed: ārammaṇa bhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaraḥ haṭṭha ppahaṭṭha ākāram pāpentaḥ āmodeti pamodeti iti vuccati

original: Samaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā īsakampi līnapakkhaṃ uddhaccapakkhañca anupaggamma anonataṃ
analyzed: samam ṭhapento ti yathā īsakam pi līna pakkham uddhacca pakkham ca an upaggamma an onatam

original: anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ, samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena
analyzed: an unnatam yathā indriyānam samatta paṭipattiyā avisamam samādhissa vā ukkaṃsa gamanena

original: āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ appanāvasena ṭhapento. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti
analyzed: āneñja ppattiyā sammat eva ṭhitam hoti evam appanā vasena ṭhapento lakkhaṇa ppaṭivedhena ati

original: aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena. Khaṇikacittekaggatāti
analyzed: anicca ādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena khaṇika citta ekagga tā ti

original: khaṇamattaṭṭhitiko samādhi. Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena
analyzed: khaṇa matta ṭṭhitiko samādhi saḥ api hi ārammaṇe nirantaram eka ākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena

original: anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ uppannāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: an abhibhūtaḥ appitaḥ viya cittam niccalam ṭhapeti tena vuttam evam uppannāya atiādi

original: Mocentoti vikkhambhanavimuttivasena vivecento visuṃ karonto, nīvaraṇāni pajahantoti
analyzed: mocento ti vikkhambhana vimutti vasena vivecentaḥ visum karontaḥ nīvaraṇāni pajahantaḥ iti

original: attho. Vipassanākkhaṇeti bhaṅgānupassanākkhaṇe. Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā
analyzed: atthaḥ vipassanā akkhaṇe iti bhaṅga anupassanā akkhaṇe bhaṅgaḥ hi nāma anicca tāya paramā

original: koṭi, tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato
analyzed: tasmā bhaṅga anupassakaḥ yogāvacaro citta mukhena sabbam saṅkhāra gatam aniccato

original: passati, no niccato, aniccassa dukkhattā dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
analyzed: passati no niccataḥ aniccassa dukkha ttā dukkhassa ca anatta ttā tat eva dukkhataḥ anupassati

original: no sukhato, anattato anupassati, no attato. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
analyzed: no sukhataḥ anattataḥ anupassati no attataḥ yasmā pana yam aniccam dukkham anattā

original: na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na taṃ rañjitabbaṃ, tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena
analyzed: na tam abhinanditabbam yat ca na abhinanditabbam na tam rañjitabbam tasmai bhaṅga dassana anusārena

original: “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati,
analyzed: aniccam dukkham anattā ati saṅkhāra gate diṭṭhe tasmin nibbindati no nandati virajjati

original: no rajjati, so evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti
analyzed: no rajjati saḥ evam nibbindantaḥ virajjantaḥ lokiyena iva tāva ñāṇena rāgam nirodha iti

original: no samudeti, nāssa samudayaṃ karotīti attho. Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: no samudeti na assa samudayam karoti iti attho atha vā saḥ evam virattaḥ yathā diṭṭham

original: saṅkhāragataṃ, taṃ tathā diṭṭhaṃ attano ñāṇena nirodheti no samudeti, nirodhamevassa
analyzed: saṅkhāra gatam tam tathā diṭṭham attanaḥ ñāṇena nirodheti no samudeti nirodham eva assa

original: manasi karoti, no samudayanti attho, so evaṃ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati, no ādiyatīti
analyzed: manasi karoti no samudayanti saḥ evam paṭipannaḥ paṭinissajjati no ādiyati iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato
analyzed: vuttam hoti ayam hi anicca ādi anupassanā saddhim khandha abhisaṅkhārehi kilesānam pariccajanato

original: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ca pariccāgapaṭinissaggo
analyzed: saṅkhata dosa dassanena tad biparīte nibbāne tad ninna tāya pakkhandanataḥ ca pariccāga paṭinissaggo

original: ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena
analyzed: ca iva pakkhandana paṭinissaggo ca ati vuccati tasmā tāya samannāgataḥ yogāvacaraḥ vutta nayena

original: kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati. Tena vuttaṃ “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya
analyzed: kilese ca pariccajati nibbāne ca pakkhandati tena vuttam saḥ vipassanā kkhaṇe anicca anupassanāya

original: niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento…pe… paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ
analyzed: nicca saññātaḥ cittam mocentaḥ vimocentaḥ upe paṭinissagga anupassanāya ādānataḥ cittam

original: mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
analyzed: mocentaḥ vimocentaḥ assasati ca iva passasati ca ati

original: Tattha aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
analyzed: tattha aniccassa aniccanti vā anupassanā anicca anupassanā tebhūmaka dhammānam anicca taṃ

original: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññātoti saṅkhatadhamme “niccā sassatā”ti
analyzed: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etam nāmam nicca saññāto ti saṅkhata dhamme niccā sassatā ti

original: pavattāya micchāsaññāya. Saññāsīsena cittadiṭṭhīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
analyzed: pavattāya micchāsaññāya saññā sīsena citta diṭṭhīnam pi gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam esa nayo

original: sukhasaññādīsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
analyzed: sukha saññā ādīsu pi nibbida anupassanāya ati saṅkhāresu nibbindana ākārena pavattāya anupassanāya

original: Nanditoti sappītikataṇhāto. Virāgānupassanāyāti tathā virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
analyzed: nandito ti sappītika taṇhātaḥ virāga anupassanāya ati tathā virajjana ākārena pavattāya anupassanāya

original: Tena vuttaṃ “rāgato mocento”ti. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya.
analyzed: tena vuttam rāgataḥ mocento ti nirodha anupassanāya ati saṅkhārānam nirodhassa anupassanāya

original: Yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena nuppajjanti, evaṃ vā anupassanā
analyzed: yathā saṅkhārāḥ nirujjhantiyā iva āyatim punabbhava vasena nu pajjanti evam vā anupassanā

original: nirodhānupassanā. Muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattā. Tenāha “samudayato mocento”ti.
analyzed: nirodha anupassanā muñcitu kamya tā hi ayam bala ppattā tena āha samudayataḥ mocentā iti

original: Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Ādānatoti niccādivasena
analyzed: paṭinissajjana ākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissagga anupassanā ādānataḥ ti nicca ādi vasena

original: gahaṇato, paṭisandhiggahaṇato vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: gahaṇataḥ paṭisandhi ggahaṇataḥ vā ti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Aniccanti anupassī, aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ pana taṃ
analyzed: aniccanti anupassī aniccassa vā anupassana sīlaḥ anicca anupassī iti ettha kim pana tam

original: aniccaṃ, kathaṃ vā aniccaṃ, kā vā aniccānupassanā, kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ
analyzed: aniccam katham vā aniccam kā vā anicca anupassanā kassa vā anicca anupassanā ati catukkam

original: vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha. Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ
analyzed: vibhāvetabbanti tam dassentaḥ aniccam veditabba nti ādim āha tattha niccam nāma dhuvam

original: sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ, na niccanti aniccaṃ, udayabbayavantaṃ, atthato saṅkhatā
analyzed: sassatam yathā tam nibbānam na niccanti aniccam udaya bbayavantam atthataḥ saṅkha tā

original: dhammāti āha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvāti, uppādavayaññathattasabbhāvāti

original: Yasmā pana “imaṃ māremī”ti yaṃ santānaṃ ārabbha māraṇicchā, tassa puthujjanakhīṇāsavabhāvena

original: payogamaraṇakkhaṇānaṃ vasena satipi santānabhede abhedoyeva, yadā ca atthasiddhi,
analyzed: vasena yadā ca

original: tadā khīṇāsavabhāvo, tasmā arahantaghātakoyeva hotīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: tadā khīṇāsava bhāvaḥ tasmai hoti iti niṭṭham ettha gantabbam

original: Aññacittenāti avadhādhippāyena amāretukāmatācittena. Natthi pāṇātipātoti amāretukāmatācittena
analyzed: añña cittena ati avadhā adhippāyena a māretu kāma tā cittena na atthi pāṇātipāto ti a māretu kāma tā cittena

original: pahaṭattā. Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro na sayameva sakkoti māretuṃ, dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā
analyzed: pahaṭa ttā kiñca api paṭhama pahāraḥ na sayam eva sakkoti māretum dutiyam pana labhitvā

original: sakkonto jīvitavināsanahetu hoti, tasmā “payogo tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato
analyzed: sakkontaḥ jīvita vināsana hetu hoti tasmā payogo tena ca iminā saṃsandanato

original: paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto, na dutiyena tassa aññacittena dinnattā. Tena
analyzed: paṭhama ppahārena iva kamma baddhaḥ yuttaḥ na dutiyena tassa añña cittena dinna ttā tena

original: vuttaṃ “ubhayehi matepi paṭhamappahāreneva kammunā baddho”ti.
analyzed: vuttam ubhayehi mate pi paṭhama ppahārena iva kammunā baddhaḥ ti

original: Kammāpattibyattibhāvatthanti ānantariyādikammavibhāgassa pārājikādiāpattivibhāgassa
analyzed: ānantariya ādi kamma vibhāgassa pārājika ādi āpatti vibhāgassa

original: ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti pavattacetanāya pubbabhāgattā “imaṃ māremī”ti
analyzed: ca vibhāvana attham eḷakam mā āremi iti pavatta cetanāya pubbabhāga ttā imam mā āremi iti

original: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tadā sannihitattā yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha
analyzed: sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanāya tadā sannihita ttā yathāvatthukam kamma baddhaḥ āha

original: “imaṃ vatthuṃ māremīti cetanāya atthibhāvato”tiādi. Sabbattha hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ
analyzed: imam vatthum māremi iti cetanāya atthi bhāvataḥ tiādi sabbattha hi purimam abhisandhi cittam

original: appamāṇaṃ tena atthasiddhiyā abhāvato, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇañca jīvitindriyaṃ
analyzed: appamāṇam tena attha siddhiyāḥ abhāvataḥ vadhaka cittam pana tad ārammaṇam ca jīvitindriyam

original: anantariyādibhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ghātako ca hotīti pāṇaghātako hoti, pāṇātipātakammunāva
analyzed: anantariya ādi bhāve pamāṇam ti daṭṭhabbam ghātako ca hoti iti pāṇa ghātako hoti pāṇa atipāta kammunā ava

original: baddho hotīti attho. Pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti yathākkamaṃ pārājikathullaccayapācittiyāni
analyzed: baddhaḥ hoti iti attho pubbe vutta nayena iva veditabbanti yathākkamam pārājika thullaccaya pācittiyāni

original: veditabbāni. “Mātāpituarahantānaṃ aññataraṃ māremī”ti guṇamahantesu pavattapubbabhāgacetanāya
analyzed: veditabbāni mātā pitu arahantānam aññataram mā āremi iti guṇa mahantesu pavatta pubbabhāga cetanāya

analyzed: dāruṇa bhāvato tathāvidha pubbabhāga cetanā parivārā sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā dāruṇā ava hoti iti

original: āha – “idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotī”ti. Iminā ca “eḷakaṃ māressāmī”ti mātāpituādīnaṃ
analyzed: āha idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hoti iti iminā ca eḷakam māressāmi iti mātā pitu ādīnam

original: māraṇepi pubbabhāgacetanāya adāruṇattā aññathā pavattaānantariyakammato evaṃ pavattānantariyassa
analyzed: māraṇe pi pubbabhāga cetanāya a dāruṇa ttā aññathā pavatta ānantariya kammataḥ evam pavatta ānantariyassa

original: nātidāruṇatā vuttāva hotīti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: na ati dāruṇa tā vuttā ava hoti iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Lohitakanti lohitamakkhitaṃ. Kammaṃ karonteti yuddhakammaṃ karonte. Yathādhippāyaṃ
analyzed: lohitakam ti lohita makkhitam kammam karonte iti yuddha kammam karonte yathādhippāyam

original: gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe. Idañca yathādhippāyaṃ tena tathāviddhabhāvadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: gatā iti yodham vijjhitvā pitari viddhe idam ca yathā adhippāyam tena tathāviddha bhāva dassana attham

original: vuttaṃ. Ayathādhippāyaṃ pana ujukameva gantvā pitari viddhepi maraṇādhippāyena attanāva
analyzed: vuttam ayathā adhippāyam pana ujukam eva gantvā pitari viddhe api maraṇa adhippāyena

original: katappayogattā nevatthi visaṅketoti vadanti. Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pitaraṃ uddissa katappayogābhāvato.
analyzed: kata ppayoga ttā na iva atthi visaṅketo ti vadanti ānantariyam pana natthi iti pitaram uddissa kata ppayoga abhāvato

original: Adhiṭṭhāyāti mātikāvasena āṇattikapayogakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāya ati mātikā vasena āṇattika payoga kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ dhanuṃ kaḍḍhetvā vijjha. Evaṃ paharāti evaṃ daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā
analyzed: evam vijjhāti evam dhanum kaḍḍhetvā vijjha evam paharāti evam daḷham asim gahetvā

original: pahara. Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi. Majjheti hatthino piṭṭhimajjhe.
analyzed: pahara evam ghātehi iti evam kamma kāraṇam katvā mārehi majjhe ti hatthinaḥ piṭṭhi majjhe

original: Etenāti “adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpetī”tiādinā. Tatthāti āṇattikappayoge.
analyzed: etena iti adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpeti itiādinā tattha āti āṇatti kappa yoge

original: Kiñcāpi kiriyaviseso aṭṭhakathāsu anāgato, pāḷiyaṃ pana “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara,
analyzed: kiñca api kiriya viseso aṭṭhakathāsu anāgataḥ pāḷiyam pana evam vijjha evam pahara

original: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparāya ābhataṃ kiriyāvisesaṃ
analyzed: evam ghātehi iti kiriyā visesassa parāmaṭṭha ttā ācariya paramparāya ābhatam kiriyā visesam

original: pāḷiyā saṃsandanato gahetvā dassento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha. Chedananti hatthādichedanaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyā saṃsandanataḥ gahetvā dassentaḥ aparaḥ naya uti ādim āha chedananti hattha ādi chedanam

original: Bhedananti kucchiādiphālanaṃ. Atha vā usunā vijjhanaṃ, asinā chedanaṃ, muggarādīhi
analyzed: bhedanam ti kucchi ādi phālanam atha vā usunā vijjhanam asinā chedanam muggara ādīhi

original: sīsādibhedananti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: sīsa ādi bhedananti evam ettha attho daṭṭhabbo saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkha muṇḍa kamma kāraṇam

original: Taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese
analyzed: tam karontāḥ uttara uṭṭhaubha tokaṇṇa cūḷika galavāṭaka paricchedena cammam chinditvā sabba kese

original: ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena paliveṭhetvā uppāṭenti, saha kesehi cammaṃ uṭṭhahati,
analyzed: ekatas gaṇṭhim katvā daṇḍakena paliveṭhetvā uppāṭenti saha kesehi cammam uṭṭhahati

original: tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti. Evamādīti
analyzed: tatas sīsa kaṭāham ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkha vaṇṇam karonti evamādi iti

original: ādi-saddena bilaṅgathālikaṃ rāhumukhaṃ jotimālikaṃ hatthapajjotikaṃ erakavattikaṃ

original: cīrakavāsikaṃ eṇeyyakaṃ baḷisamaṃsikaṃ kahāpaṇikaṃ khārāpatacchikaṃ palighaparivattikaṃ
