original: palālapīṭhakanti evamādiṃ sabbaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: palāla pīṭhakam ti evamādim sabbam kamma kāraṇam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Tattha bilaṅgathālikanti kañjiyaukkhalikakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ kammaṃ karontā sīsakapālaṃ
analyzed: tattha kañji yaukkhalika kamma kāraṇam tam kammam karontā sīsa kapālam

original: uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti, tena matthaluṅgaṃ

analyzed: upari uttarati rāhumukhanti rāhumukha kamma kāraṇam tam karontaḥ saṅkunā

analyzed: mukham vivaritvā antar mukhe dīpam kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukham nikhādanena

original: khaṇanti, lohitaṃ paggharitvā mukhaṃ pūreti. Jotimālikanti sakalasarīraṃ telapilotikāya
analyzed: khaṇanti lohitam paggharitvā mukham pūreti sakala sarīram

original: veṭhetvā ālimpenti. Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya
analyzed: veṭhetvā ālimpenti hattha pajjotikam ti hatthe tela pilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpam

original: pajjālenti. Erakavattikanti erakavattakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: pajjālenti erakavattikanti erakavatta kamma kāraṇam tam karontāḥ heṭṭhāgīvataḥ paṭṭhāya

analyzed: camma vaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake pātenti atha nam yottehi bandhitvā kaḍḍhanti saḥ attanā uva

analyzed: ṭhapenti uparimehi heṭṭhima sarīram cīraka nivāsana nivattham viya hoti eṇeyyakam ti

analyzed: eṇeyya kamma kāraṇam tam karontāḥ ubhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca aya valayāni da tvā

analyzed: aya sūlāni koṭṭenti saḥ catūhi aya sūlehi bhūmiyam patiṭṭhahati atha nam parivāretvā

analyzed: aggim karonti tam kālena kālam sandhitaḥ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi ṭhapenti

original: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanahārūni uppāṭenti. Kahāpaṇikanti
analyzed: baḷisa maṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā camma maṃsa nahārūni uppāṭenti kahāpaṇikanti

original: koṭṭenti. Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ

analyzed: ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇa chidde aya sūlam koṭṭetvā pathaviyāḥ eka ābaddham karonti

analyzed: atha nam pāde gahetvā āviñchanti palāla pīṭhakanti chekaḥ kāraṇikaḥ chavi cammam a chinditvā

original: nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati, maṃsarāsiyeva hoti, atha
analyzed: nisada potehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati maṃsarāsiyā iva hoti atha

original: naṃ keseheva pariyonandhitvā gaṇhantā palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā paliveṭhenti.
analyzed: nam gaṇhantā palāla vaṭṭim viya katvā paliveṭhenti

original: Vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā tato aññaṃ māretīti sambandho. Purimapassādīnampi vatthusabhāgato
analyzed: vatthum visaṃvādetvā tatas aññam māreti iti sambandhaḥ purima passa ādīnam pi vatthu sabhāgato

original: vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha “purato paharitvā”tiādi. Cittena “purato vā”ti niyamaṃ
analyzed: vatthu gahaṇena iva gahaṇanti āha puratas paharitvā atiādi cittena puratas vāti niyamam

original: katvā vā akatvā vā “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vutte sace aññattha paharitvā māreti,
analyzed: katvā vā a katvā vā puratas paharitvā mārehi iti vutte sace aññattha paharitvā māreti

original: lesaṃ oḍḍetvā avuttattā visaṅketova hoti. Cittena pana yattha katthaci paharitvā
analyzed: lesam oḍḍetvā a vutta ttā visaṅketaḥ uva hoti cittena pana yattha katthaci paharitvā

original: māraṇaṃ icchantopi sace “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vadati, tassa lesaṃ oḍḍetvā tathā

original: vuttamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva cittena samuṭṭhāpitaviññattikattā manussaviggahapārājikato

original: pariyāyena amuccanato “aññattha paharitvā māritepi nevatthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti,
analyzed: pariyāyena amuccanataḥ aññattha paharitvā mārite pi na iva atthi visaṅketo ti vadanti

original: keci pana taṃ na icchanti. Vatthuvisesenāti mātuādivatthuvisesena. Kammavisesoti
analyzed: keci pana tam na icchanti vatthu visesena ati mātu ādi vatthu visesena kamma viseso ti

original: ānantariyādikammaviseso. Āpattivisesoti pārājikādiāpattiviseso.
analyzed: ānantariya ādi kamma visesaḥ āpatti viseso ti pārājika ādi āpatti viseso

original: “Etaṃ gāme ṭhita”nti gāmo puggalaniyamanatthaṃ vutto, na okāsaniyamanatthaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: etam gāme ṭhitanti gāmo puggala niyamana attham vuttaḥ na okāsa niyamana attham tasmā

original: okāsaṃ aniyametvā puggalasseva niyamitattā natthi visaṅketo. “Gāmeye vā”tiādīsu pana
analyzed: okāsam a niyametvā puggalassa iva niyamita ttā natthi visaṅketaḥ gāmeye vā ti ādīsu pana

original: okāsassa niyamitattā aññattha mārite visaṅketo vutto.
analyzed: okāsassa niyamita ttā aññattha mārite visaṅketaḥ vutto

original: Tuṇḍenāti khaggakoṭiyā. Tharunāti khaggamuṭṭhinā.
analyzed: tuṇḍena ati khagga koṭiyā tharunā ati khagga muṭṭhinā

original: “Etaṃ gacchanta”nti gamanena puggalova niyamito, na iriyāpatho. Tenāha “natthi visaṅketo”ti. “Gacchantamevā”tiādinā iriyāpatho niyamito. Tenāha “visaṅketo hotī”ti.
analyzed: etam gacchantam nti gamanena puggalaḥ uva niyamitaḥ na iriyāpatho tena āha natthi visaṅketo ti gacchantam eva ati ādinā iriyāpathaḥ niyamito tena āha visaṅketaḥ hoti iti

original: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīghanti
analyzed: dīgham mārehi iti vutte api dīgha saṇṭhānānam bahu bhāvataḥ itthannāmam evarūpam ca dīgham ti

original: aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena aniddiṭṭhattā “aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha
analyzed: aññesam asādhāraṇa lakkhaṇena aniddiṭṭha ttā aniyametvā āṇāpeti iti vuttam tena iva āha

original: “yaṃ kiñci tādisaṃ māretī”ti. Ettha ca “cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā
analyzed: yam kiñci tādisam māreti iti ettha ca cittena bahūsu dīgha saṇṭhānesu ekam niyametvā

original: vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti. Parapāṇimhi
analyzed: vutte api vācāya a niyamita ttā aññasmin tādise mārite natthi visaṅketo ti vadanti para pāṇimhi

original: pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti.
analyzed: pāṇa saññi tā lakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvataḥ na iva atthi pāṇātipāto ti āha āṇāpakaḥ muccati iti

original: Yadi evaṃ okāsaniyame sati kathaṃ pāṇātipātoti? Okāsaṃ niyamentassa tasmiṃ okāse
analyzed: yadi evam okāsa niyame sati katham pāṇa atipātaḥ ti okāsam tasmin okāse

original: eva. Sati pana domanasse kathaṃ taṃ nappakāsatīti āha “sukhavokiṇṇattā”tiādi, pubbāpariyavasena

original: ubhosu passesu uppajjanakasukhehi ākiṇṇattā uppannassa ca domanassassa anuppabandhanena
analyzed: ubhosu passesu uppajjanaka sukhehi ākiṇṇa ttā uppannassa ca domanassassa an uppabandhanena

original: pavattiyā abhāvato tadā uppannampi domanassaṃ nappakāsatīti attho.
analyzed: pavattiyāḥ abhāvataḥ tadā uppannam pi domanassam na ppakāsati iti attho

original: Vinītavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vinīta vatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 180. Maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato
analyzed: maraṇa atthikā ava hutvā ti imassa kāyassa bhedena sagga pāpana adhippāyattā atthataḥ

original: maraṇatthikāva hutvā. Maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantāti evaṃ adhippāyino maraṇatthikā
analyzed: maraṇa atthikā ava hutvā maraṇa atthika bhāvam a jānantā ati evam adhippāyinaḥ maraṇa atthikā

original: nāma hontīti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā. Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na
analyzed: nāma honti iti attanaḥ maraṇatthika bhāvam a jānantāḥ na hi te attanaḥ citta ppavattim na

original: jānanti. Vohāravasenāti pubbabhāgavohāravasena, maraṇādhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇe
analyzed: jānanti vohāra vasena āti pubbabhāga vohāra vasena maraṇa adhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā khaṇe

original: karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo. Yathāyunāti
analyzed: karuṇāya abhāvataḥ kāruññena pāse baddha sūkara mocanam viya na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ yathā āyunā ati

original: vuttamevatthaṃ yathānusandhināti pariyāyantarena vuttaṃ, yathānusandhinā yathāyuparicchedenāti
analyzed: vuttam eva attham yathā anusandhinā iti pariyāya antarena vuttam yathā anusandhinā yathā āyu paricchedena ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yathānusandhināti yathānuppabandhena, yāva tasmiṃ bhave santānassa
analyzed: vuttam hoti atha vā yathā anusandhinā ati yathā anuppabandhena yāva tasmin bhave santānassa

original: anuppabandho avicchinnappavatti hoti, tāva ṭhatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: an uppabandho a vicchinna pavatti hoti tāva ṭhatvā iti vuttam hoti

original: Appaṭivekkhitvāti anupaparikkhitvā. Uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamantīti pacchā āgatānaṃ
analyzed: a paṭivekkhitvā ti an upaparikkhitvā uddham vā adhas vā saṅkamanti iti pacchā āgatānam

original: okāsadānatthaṃ nisinnapāḷiyā uddhaṃ vā adho vā gacchanti. Paccavekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthīti
analyzed: okāsa dāna attham nisinna pāḷiyāḥ uddham vā adhas vā gacchanti paccavekkhaṇa kiccam natthi iti

original: pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ vali
analyzed: pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇa kiccam natthi heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakam vali

original: na gaṇhātīti āha “tasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti. Paṭivekkhaṇañcedaṃ gihīnaṃ santakeyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: na gaṇhāti iti āha tasmin na paññāyati iti paṭivekkhaṇam ca idam gihīnam daṭṭhabbam

original: Pāḷiyaṃ musale ussiteti aññamaññaṃ upatthambhetvā dvīsu musalesu ussitesūti attho.
analyzed: pāḷiyam musale ussitā iti aññam aññam upatthambhetvā dvīsu musalesu ussitesu iti attho

original: Udukkhalabhaṇḍikanti udukkhalatthāya ānītaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ. Paṭibaddhanti bhojanapaṭibaddhaṃ,
analyzed: udukkhalabhaṇḍikam ti udukkhalatthāya ānītam dārubhaṇḍam paṭibaddham ti bhojana paṭibaddham

original: bhojanantarāyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: bhojana antarāyan ti vuttam hoti

original: 181. Aggakārikanti ettha kārikā-saddassa bhāvavacanattā “aggakiriya”nti atthaṃ vatvāpi
analyzed: agga kārikanti ettha kārikā saddassa bhāva vacana ttā agga kiriyanti attham vatvā api

original: yasmā kiriyaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā dānasaṅkhātāya aggakiriyāya yuttaṃ piṇḍapātameva
analyzed: yasmai kiriyam dātum na sakkā tasmai dāna saṅkhātāya agga kiriyāya yuttam piṇḍapātam eva

original: idha upacāravuttiyā “aggakiriyā”ti gahetabbanti āha “paṭhamaṃ laddhapiṇḍapāta”ntiādi.
analyzed: idha upacāra vuttiyā agga kiriyā ti gahetabbanti āha paṭhamam laddha piṇḍapāta ntiādi

original: 182-183. Daṇḍamuggaranti nikhādanamuggaraṃ. Vibhattibyattayenāti vibhattivipariṇāmena.
analyzed: nikhādana muggaram vibhatti byattayena ati vibhatti vipariṇāmena

original: Visesādhigamoti samādhi vipassanā ca ativiya pākaṭattā “hatthappatto viya dissatī”ti
analyzed: visesa adhigamaḥ ti samādhi vipassanā ca ati viya pākaṭa ttā hatthappatto viya dissati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Upacchindatīti “visesādhigamassa vikkhepo mā hotū”ti āhāraṃ upacchindati.
analyzed: vuttam upacchindati iti visesa adhigamassa vikkhepaḥ mā hotu uti āhāram upacchindati

original: Visesādhigamanti lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhaṃ. Byākaritvāti ārocetvā. Upacchindati,
analyzed: visesa adhigamanti lokuttara dhamma paṭilābham byākaritvā ati ārocetvā upacchindati

original: na vaṭṭatīti yasmā sabhāgānaṃ lajjibhikkhūnaṃyeva ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ tādise
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti yasmā sabhāgānam lajji bhikkhūnam yeva ariyāḥ attanā adhigata visesam tādise

original: kāraṇe sati ārocenti, te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya anesanāya paccayaṃ na pariyesanti,
analyzed: kāraṇe sati ārocenti te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya anesanāya paccayam na pariyesanti

original: tasmā tehi pariyesitapaccaye kukkuccaṃ uppādetvā āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: tasmā tehi pariyesita paccaye kukkuccam uppādetvā āhāram upacchinditum na vaṭṭati iti

original: attho. Sabhāgānañhi byākatattā upacchindituṃ na labhati. Te hi kappiyakhettaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: attho sabhāgānam hi byākata ttāḥ upacchinditum na labhati te hi kappiya khettam tena iva

original: “sabhāgānañhi lajjibhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ “upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: sabhāgānam hi lajji bhikkhūnam kathetum vaṭṭati iti idam upacchindati na vaṭṭati iti

original: imassa kāraṇaṃ dassentena vuttanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
analyzed: imassa kāraṇam dassentena vuttanti tīsu pi gaṇṭhi padesu vuttam

original: Atha vā visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvāti idaṃ visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: atha vā visesa adhigamam byākaritvā iti idam visesassa adhigata bhāva dassana tham vuttam

original: Adhigamantarāyaṃ asaṅkanteneva ca āhārupacchedo kātabboti anuññātattā adhigatena
analyzed: adhigama antarāyam ca āhāra upacchedo kātabbo ti anuññāta ttā adhigatena

original: na kātabboti dassetuṃ “visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā āhāraṃ upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: na kātabbā iti dassetum visesa adhigamam byākaritvā āhāram upacchindati na vaṭṭati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ aññesaṃ ārocentīti imissā codanāya
analyzed: vuttam kim pana ariyāḥ attanā adhigata visesam aññesam ārocenti iti imissā codanāya

original: “sabhāgānañhi lajjibhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayamettha yuttataroti amhākaṃ
analyzed: sabhāgānam hi lajji bhikkhūnam kathetum vaṭṭati iti vuttam ayam ettha yuttataraḥ ti amhākam

original: khanti, gaṇṭhipadepi ayamattho dassitoyevāti. Bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantāti cīvaraṃ dhovantā.
analyzed: khanti gaṇṭhi pade pi ayam attho dassito yā iva ati bhaṇḍakam dhovantā ati cīvaram dhovantā

original: Dhovanadaṇḍakanti bhaṇḍadhovanadaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: dhovana daṇḍakanti bhaṇḍa dhovana daṇḍam

original: 184. Ahaṃ kukkuccakoti “mama kiriyāya mareyya nu kho, no vā”ti evaṃ jātakukkuccako.
analyzed: aham mama kiriyāya mareyya nu khalu no vāti evam jāta kukkuccakaḥ

original: Sabbatthāpi panettha evarūpesu vatthūsu amate thullaccayassa vuttattā tena katappayogena
analyzed: sabbattha api pana ittha evarūpesu vatthūsu amate thullaccayassa vutta ttā tena kata ppayogena

analyzed: dukkha vedanā uppajjatu vā mā vā pārājikāya abhāvataḥ bhagavataḥ vacanena thullaccayam eva ati vadanti

original: 185. Gabbho patati etenāti gabbhapātanaṃ, tādisaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Tenāha “yena paribhuttenā”tiādi.
analyzed: gabbhaḥ patati etena ati gabbhapātanam tādisam bhesajjam tena āha yena paribhuttena atiādi

original: “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyato āpattimokkho na hotīti āha “pariyāyo nāma natthī”ti.
analyzed: maraṇa vaṇṇam vā saṃvaṇṇeyya iti vutta ttā pariyāyataḥ āpatti mokkho na hoti iti āha pariyāyaḥ nāma natthi iti

original: Gabbhaṃ na gaṇhātīti gabbhaṃ na dhāreti. Vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbho vinassanto kammaṃ
analyzed: gabbham na gaṇhāti iti gabbham na dhāreti vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbhaḥ vinassanto kammaṃ

original: vinā na nassatīti adhippāyena “dvīhākārehī”ti vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
analyzed: vinā na nassati iti adhippāyena dvīhā ākārehi iti vuttam dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathāyam pana

analyzed: gabbhaḥ hi vātena pāṇakehi kammunā ca ati tīhi kāraṇehi vinassati iti vatvā kammunā

original: vinassante pana buddhāpi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vātena pāṇakehi
analyzed: vinassante pana buddhāḥ api paṭibāhitum na sakkonti iti vuttam tattha vātena pāṇakehi

original: vā gabbhe vinassante na purimakammunā okāso kato, apica tappaccayā kammaṃ vipaccati,
analyzed: vā gabbhe vinassante na purima kammunā okāsaḥ kataḥ apica tad paccayā kammam vipaccati

original: sayameva pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vāto pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbāti iminā
analyzed: sayam eva pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vātaḥ pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbā ti iminā

analyzed: adhippāyena kammassa visum kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vutto ti daṭṭhabbam pāṇakā khāditvā antaradhāpenti iti

original: yojetabbaṃ. Avijāyanatthāya bhesajjaṃ dentassa kucchiyaṃ uppajjitvā vinassissantīti
analyzed: yojetabbam a vijāyana thāya bhesajjam dentassa kucchiyam uppajjitvā vinassissanti iti

analyzed: iminā adhippāyena dinne opāta khaṇana ādīsu viya kamma baddhaḥ kucchiyam na uppajjissanti iti

original: iminā pana adhippāyena dinne nevatthi kammabaddho.
analyzed: iminā pana adhippāyena dinne na iva atthi kamma baddhaḥ

original: Sahadhammikānanti ekassa satthuno sāsane sahasikkhamānadhammānaṃ. Pañcannampi vivaṭṭanissitasīlattā
analyzed: sahadhammikānam ti ekassa satthuno sāsane saha sikkhamāna dhammānam pañcannam pi vivaṭṭa nissita sīla ttā

analyzed: sama sīla saddhā paññānan ti vuttam ñātaka pavārita ṭṭhānato ti attanaḥ tesam vā ñātaka pavārita ṭṭhānato

original: Gilānassatthāya appavāritaṭṭhānatopi viññattiyā anuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti,
analyzed: gilānassa atthāya a pavārita ṭṭhānataḥ pi viññattiyāḥ anuññāta ttā katā api akatā viyā ati akataviññatti

analyzed: vada bhante paccayena ati evam akata pavāraṇa ṭṭhāne ca viññatti akata viññatti

original: Paṭiyādiyatīti sampādeti. Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭaṃ vadanti. Sahadhammikesu
analyzed: paṭiyādiyati iti sampādeti a kātum na vaṭṭati iti ettha dukkaṭam vadanti sahadhammikesu

original: vuttanayenevāti “imesampi pañcannaṃ akataviññattiyāpi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: vutta nayena iva āti imesam pi pañcannam akata viññattiyā api bhesajjam kātum vaṭṭati iti

original: kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā kathitaṃ. Yāva ñātakā passantīti yāva tassa ñātakā passanti.
analyzed: kurundaṭṭhakathā ayam vutta ttā kathitam yāva ñātakā passanti iti yāva tassa ñātakā passanti

original: Pitu bhaginī pitucchā. Mātu bhātā mātulo. Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkonti. Sacepi
analyzed: pitu bhaginī pitucchā mātu bhātā mātulaḥ nappahonti iti kātum na sakkonti sace pi

original: na yācantīti “yācituṃ dukkha”nti adhippāyena yadi na yācanti. Ābhogaṃ katvāti idaṃ
analyzed: na yācanti iti yācitum dukkhanti adhippāyena yadi na yācanti ābhogam katvā iti idam

original: kattabbatādassanavasena vuttaṃ, “ābhogaṃ pana akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
analyzed: kattabba tā dassana vasena vuttam ābhogam pana a katvā api dātum vaṭṭati iti tīsu pi gaṇṭhi padesu

original: likhitaṃ. Ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvāti tesaṃ puttanattādayopi tappaṭibaddhattā ñātakā
analyzed: likhitam ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvā ti tesam putta natta ādayaḥ api tad paṭibaddha ttā ñātakā

analyzed: eva ati te pi ettha iva saṅgahitā tena aññesan ti iminā aññātakānam gahaṇam veditabbam

original: Tenevāha “etesaṃ puttaparamparāyā”tiādi. Kulaparivaṭṭoti kulānaṃ paṭipāṭi, kulaparamparāti
analyzed: tena iva āha etesam putta paramparāya atiādi kula parivaṭṭo ti kulānam paṭipāṭi kula paramparā ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. “Mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti paccāsāya karontassapi yācitvāpi gahetabbaṭṭhānatāya
analyzed: vuttam hoti mayham dassanti karissanti iti paccāsāya karontassa api yācitvā api gahetabba ṭṭhāna tāya

original: ñātakesu vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vadanti. Sabbapadesupi vinicchayo
analyzed: ñātakesu vejja kammam vā kula dūsaka āpatti vā na hoti iti vadanti sabba padesu pi vinicchayaḥ

original: veditabboti cūḷamātuyātiādīsu sabbapadesu “cūḷamātuyā sāmiko”tiādinā yojetvā heṭṭhā

original: vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo.

original: Vuttanayena pariyesitvāti iminā “ñātisāmaṇerehi vā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ atidissati.
analyzed: vutta nayena pariyesitvā ti iminā ñāti sāmaṇerehi vā ti ādinā vuttam attham atidissati

original: Apaccāsīsantenāti “mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti evaṃ attano atthāya apaccāsīsantena.
analyzed: a paccāsīsantena ati mayham dassanti karissanti iti evam attanaḥ atthāya a paccāsīsantena

original: Bhikkhusaṅghassa pana upakārakattaṃ paccāsīsantena kātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Bhesajjaṃ ācikkhathā”ti
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅghassa pana upakāraka ttam paccāsīsantena kātum vaṭṭati bhesajjam ācikkhatha ati

analyzed: vutte api yathā aññamaññam pana kathā kātabbā ti idam pariyāyattā vaṭṭati evam heṭṭhā

original: vuttanayena “idañcidañca gahetvā karontī”ti iminā pariyāyena kathentassapi nevatthi dosoti ācariyā.
analyzed: vutta nayena idam ca idam ca gahetvā karonti iti iminā pariyāyena kathentassa api na iva atthi doso ti ācariyā

original: Vinayalakkhaṇaṃ ajānantassa anācariyassa tadanurūpavohārāsambhavato īdisassa lābhassa
analyzed: vinaya lakkhaṇam a jānantassa an ācariyassa tad anurūpa vohāra asambhavataḥ īdisassa lābhassa

original: uppatti nāma natthīti “ācariyabhāgo nāmāya”nti vuttaṃ, vinaye pakataññunā ācariyena
analyzed: uppatti nāma natthi iti ācariya bhāgaḥ nāma ayam ti vuttam vinaye pakataññunā ācariyena

original: labhitabbabhāgo ayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pupphapūjanatthāya dinnepi akappiyavohārena vidhānassa
analyzed: labhitabba bhāgaḥ ayam ti vuttam hoti puppha pūjana tthāya dinne pi akappiya vohārena vidhānassa

original: ayuttattā “kappiyavasenā”ti vuttaṃ, “pupphaṃ āharathā”tiādinā kappiyavohāravasenāti attho.
analyzed: ayutta ttā kappiya vasena ati vuttam puppham āharatha atiādinā kappiya vohāra vasena ati attho

original: Yadi “parittaṃ karothā”ti vutte karonti, gihiveyyāvaccakaraṇaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti “parittaṃ
analyzed: yadi parittam karotha ati vutte karonti gihi veyyāvacca karaṇa ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati iti parittam

original: karotha, bhanteti vutte na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ, “bhaṇathā”ti vutte pana dhammakathāya
analyzed: karotha bhante iti vutte na kātabbanti vuttam bhaṇatha ati vutte pana dhammakathāya

original: ajjhesanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā “kātabba”nti vuttaṃ. Dhammañhi anajjhiṭṭhenapi kathetuṃ
analyzed: ajjhesana ṭṭhāne ṭhita ttā kātabbanti vuttam dhammañhi an ajjhiṭṭhena api kathetum

original: vaṭṭati, pageva ajjhiṭṭhena. Cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti parittaṃ karontena kātabbavidhiṃ

original: Upāyapucchāti adhigamupāyapucchā. Kintīti kena pakārena, kena vidhināti attho. Katamesaṃ
analyzed: upāya pucchā ati adhigama upāya pucchā kinti iti kena pakārena kena vidhinā ati attho katamesam

original: tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā jhānādivisesā
analyzed: tvam dhammānam lābhī ti idam pana pubbe kim te adhigatan ti a niddhārita bhedā jhāna ādi visesā

original: pucchitāti idāni tesaṃ niddhāretvā pucchanākāradassanaṃ.

original: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttehi chahākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā. Ettāvatāvāti
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmai yathā vuttehi cha hākārehi adhigama byākaraṇam sodhetabbam tasmai ettāvatā avāti

original: ettakena byākaraṇamatteneva na sakkātabbo. Byākaraṇañhi ekaccassa ayāthāvatopi hotīti.
analyzed: ettakena byākaraṇa mattena iva na sakkātabbaḥ byākaraṇam hi ekaccassa a yāthāvataḥ pi hoti iti

original: Imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ vattabboti yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpakampi
analyzed: imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhana attham vattabbā ti yathā nāma jātarūpa patirūpakam pi

original: jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanacchedanehi sodhetabbaṃ, evameva
analyzed: jātarūpam viya khāyati iti jātarūpam nighaṃsana tāpana chedanehi sodhetabbam evam eva

original: imesu idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo. Vimokkhādīsūti

original: ādi-saddena samādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: ādi saddena samādhi samāpatti ñāṇa dassana magga bhāvanā phala sacchikiriyā ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Pākaṭo hotīti adhigatavisesassa satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi pākaṭo hotīti pade eseva nayo.
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ hoti iti adhigata visesassa sati sammosa abhāvato sesa pucchāsu pi pākaṭaḥ hoti iti pade esa eva nayo

original: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnakilesā pākaṭā hontīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
analyzed: sabbesam hi attanā adhigata maggena pahīna kilesāḥ pākaṭāḥ honti iti idam yebhuyya vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Kassaci hi attanā adhigatamaggavajjhakilesesu sandeho uppajjatiyeva mahānāmassa
analyzed: vuttam kassaci hi attanā adhigata magga vajjha kilesesu sandehaḥ uppajjati yā iva mahā nāmassa

original: sakkassa viya. So hi sakadāgāmī samānopi “tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ hoti ‘ko su
analyzed: sakkassa viya saḥ hi sakadāgāmī samānaḥ api tassa mayham bhante evam hoti kaḥ su

original: nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
analyzed: nāma me dhammaḥ ajjhattam appahīnaḥ yena me ekadā lobha dhammā api cittam pariyādāya

original: tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya

original: tiṭṭhantī”’ti bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Ayaṃ kira rājā sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā

original: niravasesā pahīyantīti saññī ahosi. Kiṃ ariyasāvakassa evaṃ sandeho uppajjatīti?
analyzed: niravasesā pahīyanti iti saññī ahosi kim ariya sāvakassa evam sandehaḥ uppajjati iti

original: Āma uppajjati. Kasmā? Paṇṇattiyaṃ akovidattā. “Ayaṃ kileso asukamaggavajjho”ti imissā

analyzed: paṇṇattiyāḥ akovidassa hi ariya sāvakassa evam hoti kim tassa paccavekkhaṇā natthi iti

original: Atthi, sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti. Eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati,
analyzed: atthi sā pana na sabbesam paripuṇṇā hoti ekaḥ hi pahīna kilesam eva paccavekkhati

original: sajjhāyamaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu nipuṇā.
analyzed: sajjhāya magga saṃvaṇṇanāsu nipuṇā

original: Yāya paṭipadāya yassa ariyamaggo āgacchati, sā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti āgamanapaṭipadā.
analyzed: yāya paṭipadāya yassa ariya maggaḥ āgacchati sā pubbabhāga paṭipatti āgamana paṭipadā

original: Sodhetabbāti suddhā udāhu na suddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā. Na sujjhatīti tattha

original: vatvā sujjhanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “dīgharatta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paññāyatīti etthāpi “yadī”ti
analyzed: vatvā su jjhana ākāram dassetum dīgha ratta nti ādi vuttam paññāyati iti ettha api yadi iti

original: padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya paññāyatīti sambandho. Catūsu paccayesu

original: imasmiṃ sutte vuttena sadisaṃ, samanti attho.
analyzed: imasmin sutte vuttena sadisam samanti attho

original: Khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hotīti dīgharattaṃ suvikkhambhitakilesattā. Khīṇāsavassa

original: Padabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
199. Asubhajjhānādīnīti ādi-saddena kāyagatāsatijjhānañca kasiṇajjhānañca saṅgaṇhāti.

original: Puna caparaṃ bodhisatto mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena, ayaṃ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi. Ime pañca mahāsupinā.

analyzed: iti taṃ taṃ visesa adhigama nimitta bhūte pañca mahā supine passi tena vuttam bodhisatto

original: 2. Khuddakā rukkhā ceva gacchā ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi anuggantvāva pupphanti ceva phalanti ca. Imaṃ dutiyaṃ addasa.

original: 3. Gāviyo tadahujātānaṃ vacchānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ tatiyo supino.
analyzed: gāviyaḥ tad ahu jātānam vacchānam khīram pivantiyaḥ addasa ayam tatiyaḥ su pinaḥ

original: 4. Dhuravāhe ārohapariṇāhasampanne mahāgoṇe yugaparamparāya ayojetvā taruṇe godamme
analyzed: dhura vāhe āroha pariṇāha sampanne mahā goṇe yuga paramparāyai taruṇe godamme

original: Ayaṃ catuttho supino.
analyzed: ayam catutthaḥ supinaḥ

analyzed: ekam ubhatomukham assam addasa tassa ubhosu passesu yavasīsam denti saḥ dvīhi pi mukhehi khādati ayam pañcamaḥ supinaḥ

analyzed: mahā janaḥ sata sahassa gghanakam suvaṇṇa pātim sammajjitvā idha passāvam karohi iti ekassa jarasiṅgālassa upanāmesi tam tattha passāvam karontam addasa ayam chaṭṭhaḥ supinaḥ

original: 7. Eko puriso rajjuṃ vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhipati, tena nisinnapīṭhassa heṭṭhā sayitā chātasiṅgālī tassa ajānantasseva taṃ khādati. Imaṃ sattamaṃ supinaṃ addasa.
analyzed: ekaḥ purisaḥ rajjum vaṭṭetvā pāda mūle nikkhipati tena nisinna pīṭhassa heṭṭhā sayitā chāta siṅgālī tassa a jānantassa iva tam khādati imam sattamam supinam addasa

original: 8. Rājadvāre bahūhi tucchakumbhehi parivāretvā ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ mahantaṃ pūritakumbhaṃ

original: addasa, cattāropi pana vaṇṇā catūhi disāhi catūhi anudisāhi ca ghaṭehi udakaṃ āharitvā

analyzed: tattha iva udakam āsiñcanti tuccha kumbhe olokentā api na atthi ayam aṭṭhamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 9. Ekaṃ pañcapadumasañchannaṃ gambhīraṃ sabbatotitthaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ addasa, samantato
analyzed: ekam pañca paduma sañchannam gambhīram sabbatotittham pokkharaṇim addasa samantataḥ

analyzed: āvilam tīra ppadese dvipada catu padānam akkamanaṭṭhāne accham vippasannam anāvilam ayam navamaḥ supinaḥ

analyzed: sata sahassa gghanakam candana sāram pūti takkena vikkiṇante addasa ayam ekādasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 12. Tucchalābūni udake sīdantāni addasa. Ayaṃ dvādasamo supino.
analyzed: tuccha lābūni udake sīdantāni addasa ayam dvādasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 14. Khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahante kaṇhasappe vegena anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ cuddasamo supino.

original: uppannāni kammāni na karissanti, evaṃ sabbathāpi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ hāniyeva bhavissati,
analyzed: uppannāni kammāni na karissanti evam sabbathā api tesam rājūnam hāniyā iva bhavissati

original: mahāgoṇānaṃ yugaparamparāya ayojitakālo viya bhavissati. Ayaṃ catutthassa vipāko.
analyzed: mahāgoṇānam yuga paramparāya ayojita kālaḥ viya bhavissati ayam catutthassa vipāko

original: 5. Adhammikarājakāleyeva adhammikabālarājāno adhammike lolamanusse vinicchaye ṭhapessanti,

original: “sañcaraṇabhāva”nti, itthipurisānaṃ antare sañcaraṇabhāvanti attho. Jāyattane jārattaneti
analyzed: sañcaraṇa bhāvanti itthi purisānam antare sañcaraṇa bhāvanti atthaḥ jāyattane jārattane iti

original: ca nimittatthe bhummaṃ, jāyabhāvatthaṃ jārabhāvatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Jāyabhāveti
analyzed: ca nimitta atthe bhummam jāya bhāva ttham jāra bhāva ttham ti vuttam hoti jāya bhāve ti

original: bhariyabhāvāya. Jārabhāveti sāmikabhāvāya. Kiñcāpi imassa padabhājane “jārī bhavissasī”ti
analyzed: bhariya bhāvāya jāra bhāva iti sāmika bhāvāya kiñcā api imassa pada bhājane jārī bhavissasi iti

original: itthiliṅgavasena padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ, jārattaneti pana niddesassa ubhayaliṅgasādhāraṇattā
analyzed: itthi liṅga vasena pada bhājanam vuttam jārattana iti pana niddesassa ubhaya liṅga sādhāraṇa ttā

original: purisaliṅgavasenapi yojetvā atthaṃ dassento “itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocento jārattane
analyzed: purisa liṅga vasena api yojetvā attham dassentaḥ itthiyāḥ matim purisassa ārocentaḥ jārattane

original: ārocetī”tiādimāha. Ettha hi “jāro bhavissasī”ti itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocento
analyzed: āroceti itiādim āha ettha hi jāraḥ bhavissasi iti itthiyāḥ matim purisassa ārocentaḥ

original: jārattane āroceti nāma. Pāḷiyaṃ pana itthiliṅgavaseneva yojanā katā, tadanusārena
analyzed: jārattane ārocā iti nāma pāḷiyam pana itthi liṅga vasena iva yojanā katā tad anusārena

original: purisaliṅgavasenapi sakkā yojetunti.
analyzed: sakkā yojetun ti

original: Idāni pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayenapi atthaṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Pati bhavissasīti vuttamevatthaṃ
analyzed: idāni pāḷiyam vutta nayena api attham dassentaḥ api ca iti ādim āha pati bhavissasi iti vuttam eva attham

original: “sāmiko bhavissasī”ti pariyāyavacanena visesetvā dasseti. Idañca jārattaneti niddesassa
analyzed: sāmikaḥ bhavissasi iti pariyāya vacanena visesetvā dasse ti idam ca jārattanā iti niddesassa

original: ubhayaliṅgasādhāraṇattā vuttaṃ. Muhuttikā bhavissasīti asāmikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
analyzed: ubhaya liṅga sādhāraṇa ttā vuttam muhuttikā bhavissasi iti asāmikam sandhāya vuttam

analyzed: jārī bhavissasi iti sa sāmikam sandhāya antamasaḥ taṅkhaṇikāya api iti idam nidassanam attanti

original: āha “etenevupāyenā”tiādi.
analyzed: āha etena iva upāyena ati ādi

original: 303. Serivihāranti sacchandacāraṃ. Attano vasanti attano āṇaṃ. Gottanti gotamagottādikaṃ
analyzed: serivihāranti sa chanda cāram attanaḥ vasanti attanaḥ gottanti gotama gotta ādikam

original: gottasaddo, dhammacārīsu ca dhammasaddo vattatīti āha “sagottehī”tiādi. Tattha sagottehīti

analyzed: samāna kula dhammehi vā tena iva āha ekam satthāram tiādi tattha ekam satthāram uddissa

original: Sasāmikā sārakkhā. Yassā gamane raññā daṇḍo ṭhapito, sā saparidaṇḍā. Pacchimānaṃ

original: Pubbaṇṇanissitanti ettha pubbaṇṇaviruhanaṭṭhānaṃ pubbaṇṇa-saddena gahitaṃ. Tenāha
analyzed: pubbaṇṇa nissitanti ettha pubbaṇṇa viruhana ṭṭhānam pubbaṇṇa saddena gahitam tena āha

analyzed: sattannam dhaññānaṃ pe ṭhitanti abhihananti ettha ati abbhāghātam verigharanti

analyzed: vuttam eva attham vibhāvetum corānam māraṇa atthāya katan ti vuttam dhammagandhikā ti

original: hatthapādādichindanagandhikā.

analyzed: āvijjitum na sakkā hoti iti chinda taṭa ādi sambhavataḥ na sakkā hoti āvijjitum pācinanti

original: kuṭivatthusāmantā cinitabbaadhiṭṭhānaṃ. Kiñcāpi idha pubbapayogasahapayogānaṃ adinnādāne

original: viya viseso natthi, tathāpi tesaṃ vibhāgena dassanaṃ chinditvā puna kātabbāti ettha

original: Antolepeneva niṭṭhāpetukāmaṃ sandhāya “antolepe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahilepe vāti etthāpi
analyzed: antar lepena iva niṭṭhāpetu kāmam sandhāya antar lepe vā ātiādi vuttam bahi lepe vā ti ettha api

original: nānācodakā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana “nānācuditakā”ti, tasmā “sambahule”ti bahuttaniddese

analyzed: sambahulesu pi iti imam attham dassetum kataḥ

original: Dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā pesetvāti “tvaṃyeva gantvā codehī”ti dūtaṃ vā pesetvā
